name: Hue Four Seasons Hotel
address: 6/9 lane 7 nguyen cong tru, Huế, Việt Nam
description:
Hue Four Seasons Hotel có hồ bơi ngoài trời, khu vườn, phòng chờ chung và nhà hàng ở Huế. Ngoài dịch vụ phòng, chỗ nghỉ này còn có sân hiên phơi nắng. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, bếp chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Các căn đi kèm điều hòa, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình vệ tinh, tủ lạnh, ấm đun nước, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và bàn làm việc. Tất cả các phòng có phòng tắm riêng với máy sấy tóc, trong đó một số phòng có ban công và một số phòng khác cũng nhìn ra thành phố. Tất cả các phòng ở khách sạn được trang bị dép đi trong phòng và ổ cắm iPod.

Hue Four Seasons Hotel cách Cầu Tràng Tiền 14 phút đi bộ và Chợ Đông Ba 1.9 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay quốc tế Phú Bài, cách chỗ nghỉ 14 km.

review.comment_positive: Laura is a wonderful host, she could not be more helpful and genuine. The location was really close to all the restaurants etc. but hidden down a back street so it was very quiet. Breakfast was excellent and you could have as much as you liked!
review.comment_negative: When it rains the alleys leading to the hotel flood, bring sensible shoes in wet season

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: Sehr freundliche und zuvorkommende Familie. Sind extra für mich wachgeblieben, da ich erst um 23.30 in Hue eingetroffen bin. Leckeres Essen und sauber.
review.comment_negative: Einrichtung teilweise in die Jahre gekommen, so hat z.b. eine Glühbirne gefehlt. Für den Preis aber absolut in Ordnung:)

review.comment_positive: Hôtel familial : tout était parfait, l'accueil, la chambre, la location du scooter.... L'hôtel est dans une rue calme. La petite famille est très sympathique et amicale à nos petits soins. Merci pour tout

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The room was clean, very bright with big windows and a little balcony. Breakfast was good and the location is perfect: central but in a quiet back alley. But the best of Four Seasons are the people. They owners are really wonderful people, helpful but not pushy and  also very honest. I highly recommended this hotel. Thank you very much we really enjoyed our stay with you.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Wonderfully friendly and helpful hosts

review.rating: Warm and hospitable hosts! Great location and value for money!
review.comment_positive: This place really feels like home! The hosts are suuper nice and helfpul, making the whole stay very enjoyable. Laura helped us with organizing an excursion to the national park nearby as well as a taxi to the airport (which was cheaper than Grab :). The rooms really correspond to the pictures which is a big plus since this is not a case for most of the hotels we’ve been at in Vietnam. The location is excellent as it is near all the restaurant and nightclubs but far enough so you don’t hear the noise.
review.comment_negative: The drain in the shower was a bit clogged so sometimes the water overflowed from the shower a bit but really nothing to be worried about. Generally the cleanliness is a 4 out of 5, but I’m writing this only so that other travellers set their expectations straight, not because it was an issue that spoiled our trip in any way.

review.rating: Unbedingt hingehen! Lieber eine Nacht länger als zu kurz!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Das Hotel hat eine sehr gute Lage und ich konnte vom meinem Zimmer den Fluss sehen. Dennoch war es sehr ruhig gelegen, da es sich am Ende einer kleinen freundlichen Gasse befindet. Das Zimmer verfügte über einen Balkon, war sehr sauber und gut ausgestattet. Großartig war das große bodentiefe Fenster, aus welchem man wunderbar schauen konnte. Das allerbeste des Hotels ist aber die Gastgeberin. Ich weiß offen gestanden nicht wie sie das machte, aber ich hatte den Eindruck, sie kannte von allen Gästen den Namen (zumindest meinen) und gab einem sofort das Gefühl, man wohne bei guten Freunden! Das beste Hotel meiner 10 wöchigen Reise! Das Hotelzimmer wäre auch einen höheren Preis wert!
review.comment_negative: Eigentlich war alles sehr gut! Einzig die Klimaanlage hätte ein wenig leistungsfähiger sein können!

review.comment_positive:
Hôtel formidable et très calme, dans un quartier pourtant animé, avec un accueil inégalable!
La chambre est confortable, la piscine agréable, le petit-déjeuner copieux et l'ambiance familiale et attentionnée! Merci! Merci!

La gentillesse de Laura et sa famille, tout le temps disponible.
La possibilité de louer un scooter directement auprès d'eux.
Nous avons bénéficié d'un surclassement, la chambre avec 2 lits doubles est juste exceptionnelle, avec baie vitrée et vue sur la Ville.

Personnel très serviable 
Prix du linge à prix coutant 
Hôtel calme et bien placé 
Un endroit où on reviendra si on retourne à hue
we mochten erg vroeg inchecken

review.rating: inexpensive, great location, and great host of this hotel. I really enjoyed the homemade breakfast that’s included with

review.comment_positive: Nos gustó todo. Una familia muy agradable, nos tratarón muy bien, incluso nos dieron una habitación mejor de la que teníamos porque había quedado libre. Desayuno muy rico. Una pena no haber podido estar más días aquí. Recomendamos 100% este sitio.

siamo arrivati pomeriggio tardi dopo un lungo viaggio e ci hanno accolto con un te caldo e un po’ di frutta fresca, la gentilezza di tutta la famiglia è il punto forte di questa struttura . camera molto spaziosa e molto luminosa, letto comodo, bagno pulito, posizione buona. colazione alla carta con diverse scelte.
ci siamo sentiti in famiglia

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: Value for money
Breakfast was good and the staff were extremely nice and helpful
Super accueil,un grand merci à Laura et sa famille.ils nous ont aidés dans toutes nos démarches et ont été très attentionnés.Je recommande vivement cet endroit.
La gentillesse des patrons, prêts à vous rendre service et vous aider.

review.rating: A great place to stay in the heart of Hue.
review.comment_positive: Laura and the team are absolutely amazing and make you feel welcome from the moment you arrive at the hotel. The breakfast was delicious and the view from our room was great.

review.rating: Super freundlich, sauber und spitzen Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis
review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Die Besitzerin war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Alles war sauber, Zimmer mit Balkon. Frühstück war sehr lecker und reichlich.

L’hôtel est bien situé, dans une ruelle au calme, dans la ville moderne. La famille est adorable, on m’a offert du thé et des fruits à l’arrivée. La chambre était correcte pour le prix et propre. Le petit déjeuner est bien.
review.comment_negative: La chambre sentait un peu l’humidité, il n’y a pas de ventilation dans la salle de bains, j’ai donc du aérer.

review.comment_positive: Bienveillance, confort, disponibilité, je recommande
Great location and amazing friendly behaviour. Highly recommended
finally we met normal and nice people in vietnam who don't count on money and are helpful from the heart. we recommend this hotel. everything was great. thank you

They were super kind to us and were aware of everything at all times, Laura is so nice! The room was very clean and comfortable. I forgot a bag with the medicines I needed and she immediately sent them to the hotel where I was in Hoi An. Without a doubt one of the best places where we stayed in Vietnam.

Personal muy amable, te reciben con un zumo y fruta, cosa que se agradece con el calor. Habitaciones limpias con vistas muy bonitas, camas cómodas, aire acondicionado y ventilador. Desayuno correcto. A un paso de la calle peatonal con bares y restaurantes. Buena relación calidad-precio.

Localisation au calme mais très proche de toute l’animation 
Propriétaires super sympa, on est arrivé très tôt, ils nous ont offert le petit déjeuner 
Chambre propre

review.rating: We had a good stay at this well located family hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We had a great stay at this family hotel. It could do more with the cleaning. The breakfast was so good, the host makes the best omelets. They also serve delicious fresh juices and fruits. The location was good, close to the restaurants, boat cruises and street food.

review.rating: Gia đình mình đã có 3 ngày lễ tuyệt vời. Giá phòng và dịch vụ xe đưa đón hợp lí. Sẽ quay lại !!!!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: The family running the hotel was extremely helpful in all ways. Location was good, hotel was in good condition, and the room was comfortable

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive:
TOUT ÉTAIT PARFAIT ! Laura et son équipe sont des gens géniaux. L’hospitalité au top (meilleure du Vietnam!), très bonne cuisinière. 

La chambre était très propre

Rien à redire tout était parfait
yên tĩnh và sạch sẽ

review.rating: superbe expérience et très belle rencontre
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
vraiment tout l établissement est très bien situé au calme et avec une jolie vue sur le jardin de plus Laura est d une gentillesse incroyable elle vous aidera pour réserver des transports et pour toute sortie , nous avons passé un superbe séjour , nous recommandons fortement cet établissement  
Céline
The staff was very kind and helpful. The room is quite big and clean. The location is also really nice.
review.comment_negative: The mattress was a big hard.

review.rating: Very nice hotel with the best hospitality
review.comment_positive:
The family who runs this hotel is simply the kindest. The hospitality from the moment we stepped in was so good. We even got a small breakfast when we arrived from our night train, and were able to check in early.
The rooms are spacious, and have comfortable big beds. And the location is great, a bit outside the imperial city, but still within a walking distance. There's also a lot of restaurants nearby.
review.comment_negative: The only thing to improve are the lamps hanging from the ceiling. Now they were swinging and hitting the wall slightly when the fan was on in the room. Another very minor thing, because the beds are so big (whuch is nice) it was slightly difficult to move around in the room when you're with someone.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
La gentilezza e L'accoglienza delle persone che gestiscono l'hotel. La struttura è pulita e ha una piccola piscina che i nostri figli hanno adorato (utilizzata anche dopo il check out...grazie!).
Noleggiano motorini a prezzi molto ragionevoli e  il noleggio di bicicletta è poco distante.
review.comment_negative: Nulla. Se dovessimo tornare a Hue non avremmo dubbi a prenotare nuovamente qui.

review.comment_positive: Everything! The room were lovely bright, modern and clean. Breakfast was lovely and served whenever you want which was great for us to sleep in. Laura was so helpful and friendly. Great location not far from all the bars and restaurants.
Très très bon accueil et c est essentiel, merci pour ce moment
Die Gastgeber waren sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Familiäre Atmosphäre. Bei der Weiterreise wurde stets unterstützt. Roller inkl. Gepäckservice für oneway konnte über den Gastgeber gebucht werden.

review.rating: Vistas bonitas al rio y muy centrico
review.comment_positive: Nos gustó mucho el trato del personal, nos acompañaron hasta la habitación y además nos dieron una habitación superior a la que habíamos contratado con unas vistas muy bonitas al rio Perfume
review.comment_negative: El colchón para mi gusto era muy duro y la base de la cama hacía mucho ruido al girarte pero eso creo que es algo muy subjetivo

review.rating: Une adresse à conseiller sans hésitation, même si on est pas dans 5 étoiles.
review.comment_positive: L’accueil chaleureux et très souriant, la disponibilité du personnel prêt à vous porter les valises jusque dans la rue au plus proche de votre Taxi. Un très bon rapport qualité prix. Le Vietnam comme on l’aime.

We arrived early after travelling from Hanoi but Laura was very accommodating, allowing us to check in early and even gave us breakfast before we checked in. There's a really nice vibe about the place and we would have stayed longer if we were in Hue for another day. Laura was very helpful in showing us what to do in the area. There is a nice family feel to the hotel. It's very clean, the room we stayed in was very spacious and the location is great for walking to the old town.
Chỗ ở rất sạch sẽ, anh chị chủ nhà siêu nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Anh chị chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình. Địa điểm rất tiện lợi, ngay trung tâm thành phố, gần những quán ăn ngon và địa điểm du lịch.

Laura et sa famille sont très accueillants et prodiguent de bons conseils pour les visites autour de Hué. 
L'hôtel est cosy et très propre.  Il est proche des restaurants (rues piétonnes le week-end). La citadelle est à 20 minutes à pied.
review.comment_negative: Pas assez  de tables pour le petit-déjeuner qu'à tous les clients viennent en même temps au lobby.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nice small hotel on a quiet street. good price for good quality. very friendly owners! everything was great, thank you!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: Bel accueil et petit déjeuner copieux. Je recommande
Great location, big rooms and friendly staff, make you feel welcome and so helpful. We really enjoyed our stay, no complaints :)

Die Gastgeberfamilie ist super nett, Laura kümmert sich um alles und hat uns von der ersten Sekunde an ein sehr gutes Gefühl gegeben. Wir fühlten uns sofort willkommen! Sie machte uns kostenlosen early Check-in möglich, da wir sehr früh aus Ninh Binh über Nacht anreisten. Die Lage ist super zum Erkunden der Stadt und der Zitadelle (man kann alles laufen). Das Frühstück war sehr lecker und reichlich. Zudem haben wir ein kostenloses Zimmer Upgrade mit Balkon bekommen :)

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: La dueña es un amor de persona y te ayuda en todo. La cama es una maravilla de cómoda!!!
sạch, chị chủ nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Accueil très agréable
Bon petit-déjeuner copieux

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Laura war sehr nett und herzlich. Frühstück war einfach aber lecker und niemand musste hungrig den Tisch verlassen. Uns wurden jeden Tag frische Handtücher und Zimmerreinigung angeboten.
review.comment_negative: Ehrliche Meinung: Bett selbst für vietnamesische Verhältnisse sehr hart. Zimmer war schon deutlich abgewohnt und ich denke, mit mehr Aufmerksamkeit könnten die Zimmer deutlich besser aussehen. Für den Preis ist natürlich kein Luxus zu erwarten und wir sind grundsätzlich auch mit einfachem Standard zufrieden. Dennoch fand ich enttäuschend, dass die Wände des Zimmers und Vorhänge so verschmutzt und fleckig waren. Dadurch wirkte der Raum im Allgemeinen nicht sauber. Weiterhin hatten wir schon seit dem ersten Betreten des Raumes ziemlich viele Mini-Ameisen im Zimmer. Die kleinen Viecher schocken uns nicht mehr aber das waren wirklich viele und man musste die Taschen geschlossen halten und darauf achten, dass nichts im Zimmer offen herumliegt. Ich wollte keine Chemiekeule im Zimmer verteilt haben und habe Laura daher dann beim Auschecken darüber informiert, damit man es vor dem nächsten Gast angehen kann. Sie sagte auch sofort, dass sie etwas gesprüht hätte, wenn wir das gewollt hätten. Also falls das Problem auftreten sollte... es wäre lösbar. Aufgrund der bisherigen Bewertungen waren wir etwas überrascht und enttäuscht aber unter Berücksichtigung des Preises ist die Unterkunft okay.

review.rating: Amazing value for money with wonderful kind staff
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The owners of the hotel are the sweetest family. They genuinely care about the guests and ensuring they are enjoying their stay. The rooms were comfortable and the showers were excellent. having a small pool to cool off was a real bonus. The location is perfect for walking to a variety of restaurants. The hotel do a delicious freshly cooked to order breakfast. We would definitely stay here again and highly reccommend.

Das beste Hotel auf unserer Reise durch Vietnam. 
Sehr ruhige Lage und trotzdem zentral.
Die Zimmer sind neu und sehr geräumig, mit guter Ausstattung und bequemen Betten.
Frühstück gibt es keine festgelegten Zeiten, quasi immer. Falls man nicht satt ist, gibt es auch noch einen Nachschlag.
Das Highlight sind allerdings die Eigentümer, so unglaublich herzlich und hilfsbereit. Es gibt zu jedem Wunsch einen Tip und Unterstützung.
A simpatia do Staff é excepcional, atenciosos e preocupados com o bem estar dos hóspedes
Chị chủ rất dễ thương

review.rating: Todo Nuevo, muy buena ubicación y el personal súper amable
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Muy buena ubicación y la responsable, Laura, fue majísima, muy pendiente de nosotros. Nos organizó las motos para el Hai Van Pass y estaban muy bien. Baño reformado y limpio. las instalaciones muy bien.
review.comment_negative: La camas eran bastante duras, un poco incómodas. Y el desayuno no era nada del otro mundo, aunque estaba bien. Por lo demás todo muy bien.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Laura and Michael are great hosts and very helpful. It's a family-run hotel located very close to all the nightspots in Hue, good value for money

The family who runs this hotel are very welcoming and accommodating. Upon arrival, we were greeted with a warm drink (it was a cold day!) and fresh fruit. The room was lovely, with a great view. When we headed out to explore the town, they gave us an umbrella, a map and plenty of information. Genuinely just such a nice experience! Would 100% recommend. (Oh also, breakfast was great too)

Diese Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral aber trotzdem ruhig. Die Partymeile und Promenade am Fluss ist in einigen Minuten fußläufig zu erreichen, aber nicht zu hören. 
Der Pool ist ein Plus, um sich nach einem heissen Tag mit den vielen Sehenswürdigkeiten abzukühlen. Wer mit viel Gepäck unterwegs ist, freut sich über den Aufzug. Das Frühstück ist einfach, aber schmackhaft, vor allem die frisch gepressten Säfte waren erfrischend. 
Das Personal ist außerordentlich gewillt, alle unsere Wünsche zu erfüllen. So hat die Besitzerin uns mit ihrem Mopet zu einem speziellen Laden für Ao dai gefahren, uns dort beraten und für uns einen guten Preis ausgehandelt. 
Die Restaurantempfehlungen waren sehr gut und hilfreich. Außerdem wurde uns der Transfer nach Hoi An zu einem unschlagbaren Preis vermittelt. Der Wäscheservice war zuverlässig und super günstig. Selbst die Flasche Wasser in der Minibar war preiswerter als im Supermarkt an der Straße. 

Wir können diese Unterkunft ohne Einschränkung weiterempfehlen.

Camere accoglienti, pulite, condizionatore e Wi-Fi ben funzionanti, colazione abbondante e varia, posizione comodissima alle vie centrali ma soprattutto Laura host gentile e molto disponibile ad accogliere ogni tua esigenza

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: I've been traveling for 2 months, but this hotel was the best one I've stayed. All stuff is extremely friendly and would do anything to help you with any queries.  Thank you very much!

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié  four seasons pour plusieurs raisons : les chambres très agréables.  Elles sont grandes hyper claires. La taille de la fenêtre avec 1 vue plongeante sur le quartier tranquille avec vue au lointain sur la rivière donne une atmosphère apaisante. Le personnel est très attentionné avec une mention spéciale pour Laura qui s' est pliée en 4 pour nous aider dans nos  démarches  de recherches de billets train ,scooter, taxi etc contrairement  aux dires d autres voyageurs  elle nous a gate au petit déjeuner. Merci beaucoup L'aura ! On recommande de petit hôtel calme  dans cette cohue de Hue !

Spacious and clean room, confortable bed, nice shower, good views, cute balcony, super sweet staff, incredibly helpful host and a great breakfast at an unbeatable location. Ticks pretty much all the boxes!

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Un hôtel bien placé, au calme Les chambres sont très agréables Personnel très sympa Parfait

review.rating: Nice room with an amazing view
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We had a nice clean room with balcony and huge windows with a wonderful view of the city. The staff was helpful and friendly. The location is OK, but quite far from the ancient city on foot.
review.comment_negative: The doors don't provide any acoustic insulation as they are really thin/untight. There were some people chatting/laughing in the next room and it was really loud for the huge part of the night (it wasn't even a party though, just conversations - the insulation is that bad)

review.comment_positive: Super liebe Gastgeber, tolles Frühstück mit frischen Obst und großer Auswahl. Ruhige, aber dennoch zentrale Lage.
super nice owner

review.rating: We had a nice time in Four Seasons hotel. The staff was so friendly. Location is good.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: The loveliest host we’ve met during our travels in Vietnam. So welcoming and kind and helpful and giving us all the best recommendations for what to eat and where and where to go. She really made our experience in Hue complete. The hotel is very conveniently located close to main street and walking street and the river and heaps of eateries nearby but still quiet as it’s in a side alley. Loved our balcony overlooking the neighbor’s garden jungle and altar house. Lovely experience overall and would go back without hesitation.

La mujer que lleva el hotel es una de las personas más amables que he visto en mi vida, muy atenta, sonriente, dispuesta a ayudar en todo momento.
La habitación es tirando a pequeña aunque muy funcional, mucho almacenamiento.
Desayuno rico, a la carta.

Preisleistung ist in Ordnung.
Die Familie ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.
Zimmer Größe OK. Lage OK.
review.comment_negative: Man kann beim Pool nichtmal sitzen (alles sehr klein). Wir hatten auch einen komischen Geruch im Zimmer.

review.comment_positive:
La famille qui tient l’hôtel est adorable. Elle nous a permis de faire le check in avant l’heure prévue. 
Emplacement top pour visiter Hue
review.comment_negative: Propreté de la chambre et des tables du petit déjeuner à revoir

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Alojamiento con excelente ubicacion, a no mas de 15 minutos andando de la Ciudadela, y en calle con poco ruido de motos y coches. Excelente desayuno y excelente calidad-precio. Lo mejor, el trato y amabilidad de los dueños. Su ayuda fue excepcional.
Muy recomendable

review.rating: Favourite place I’ve stayed in SEA!
review.comment_positive:
Laura and her family were extremely welcoming, going above and beyond at every aspect of our stay. 
Breakfast was great, with lots and choice and we were always offered more food if we wanted. 
The pool is great!
Lots of good restaurants around. 
Laura also provided a map and recommended places to go which was extremely helpful.

La habitación está muy bien, con baño e incluso un pequeño bacon que nos vino genial para secar ropa. La cama era cómoda, el aire acondicionado funcionaba perfecto y, en general, estuvimos a gusto.
La habitación incluye el desayuno que es genial!!
El hotel está regentado por una familia que siempre estan dispuestos a ayudar. Laura es la que mejor habla inglés y es con la que, normalmente, tendrás intercambio. 
Nos ofrecieron conductor para ir a ver las tumbas a mejor precio de lo que tenian en otras agencias de la calle. Eso si, el señor era justo un conductor, no hablaba nada de inglés ni, por supuesto, podia dar ninguna explicación de lo que íbamos a ver (no se si los operadores turísticos de fuera ofrecian conductor que también te pudiese hacer un poco de guia).
review.comment_negative:
Está un poquito alejado de la ciudadela (35 minutos a pie), con lo que para ir andando, con el calor que hacia, se nos hizo un poco pesado. Solución: descargad la app grab, va genial!
La habitación no tiene cortinas opacas con lo que, a  las 6 de la mañana te despiertas con la iluminación exterior.
Nuestra habitación estaba en el primer piso, muy cerca de donde vive la familia, así que un par de noches hubo mucho ruido de niños jugando y gritando por los pasillos. Nosotros lo arreglamos con tapones para los oídos

review.comment_positive:
Struttura semplice ottima per qualche giorno a Hue.
Laura molto gentile e disponibile.
Camera carina e pulita.
Ottima posizione.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: La sympathie et l’accueil des propriétaires qui se plient en quatre pour vous faire plaisir
review.comment_negative: Légèrement bruyant mais il y avait des travaux donc à nuancer

review.comment_positive:
personnel très attentionné 
bon emplacement 
breakfast très bien

Lovely host 
Perfect breakfast 
perfect stay!
Everything! The staff made this hotel exceptional.

review.rating: Đúng là khách sạn của người Huế nên thật sự cảm nhận được chất Huế của gia đình chủ khách sạn
review.comment_positive:
Chị chủ nhà rất thân thiện, ân cần quan tâm để khách đến thuê. Phòng sạch sẽ, tiện nghi đầy đủ. Khoảng cách di chuyển đến trung tâm chỉ có 5 phút nên khá thuận tiện đi lại
Tổng chi phí đã bao gồm suất ăn sáng và nước uống.
schönes Bad, bequeme Betten, super Frühstück und nette Besitzer
We have free breakfast by the owners, It's so lovely to be here

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Really nice pace. Lora and the family are very supportive to us . Very good breakfast .

Laura war eine tolle Gastgeberin und hat uns mit Tipps für die Umgebung bestens versorgt. Außerdem haben wir ein kostenloses Zimmer-Upgrade bekommen und durften auch noch nach dem Check-Out ein Badezimmer samt Dusche benutzen. Insgesamt ein schöner Aufenthalt!
All
El personal inmillorable, atents i amables en tot moment. Ens van recomanar i facilitar moltes coses, i van ser una gran ajuda per gaudir la ciutat. Molt recomanable!

het personeel is heel vriendelijk! we werden goed ontvangen en de mevrouw die ons de kamer liet zien was voor al heel erg lief en wou ons graag vertellen wat er allemaal te doen was in de stad. ook elke keer wanneer we weer aankwamen vroeg ze hoe het met ons ging en naar onze dag. op korte termijn nog ontbijt kunnen krijgen en spontaan ook een scooter kunnen huren.
review.comment_negative: de kamer waar wij in sliepen had helaas niet echt donkere  gordijnen bij het kleine raam waardoor we in de ochtend vroeg wakker waren.

review.comment_positive: Όμορφο οικογενειακό ξενοδοχείο, καθαρό, σε πολύ καλή τοποθεσία, με πλούσιο πρωινό. Η  Laura πάντα πρόθυμη να σε εξυπηρετήσει σε ότι τις ζητήσεις.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Super Frühstück. Nettes Personal, bestes in Preis Leistung
Best value stay of our entire Vietnam trip. Lovely room with a great view and a good en suit. Very clean, lovely staff, nice breakfast, good restaurants nearby (the Korean bbq place was great) 10/10.

Laura and her family were great hosts and were so welcoming when we arrived early morning off an overnight train, we were able to check into our room early which was hugely appreciated.
The rooms are lovely, with everything we could need, including a balcony.
There's a good range of options for breakfast.
100% highly recommend a stay here!
Laura was very helpful and nice. Great location, right in the middle of the backpacker district. Excellent for the price!

Allez y les yeux fermés ! 
Un super homestay, des chambres très agréables et propres. Un petit dejeuner succulent et surtout une hôte aux petits soins. Nous avons pu faire un early check in et en attendant nous avons été gâtés avec une assiette de fruits et un petit déjeuner.

review.rating: Very pleasant stay. Very kind and attentive staff.
review.comment_positive: Requested a room in a higher floor and got the one in the highest floor 😁.  The staff was very attentive and friendly. They even let us take a shower in the evening when we were leaving even though we have already checked out.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Room with a view on the garden! Welcome drink and fruit. Very friendly, generous and helpful hosts. Our kids place with their kids in the pool. Location is great, close to restaurants, shops and bars, but quiet.

Amazing value for money. The hostess is very friendly and helpful. We were greeted with some juice and fruit. Breakfast was a la carte and was delicious with many choices. One a few streets away of the walking street, which has a nice atmosfere at the evening.
review.comment_negative: The room was a bit smelly from the air conditioning.

review.rating: A wonderful value for the money!
review.comment_positive: Laura and her family were incredibly kind. She even upgraded our room at no extra cost. The room we stayed in was quite spacious, airy, and bright! And the location of this hotel is very central and convenient. :-)) For the price-point, this place is a very good find in Hue!

review.rating: bien pour une ou deux journées
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: la grandeur de la chambre, le balcon, la piscine, la localisation, la gentillesse du personnel, le déjeuner délicieux
review.comment_negative: l’air conditionné ne fonctionnait pas bien et nous avons eu de l’eau qui coulait du plafond de la salle de bain

review.comment_positive: Tutto oltre le aspettative. Famiglia accogliente attiva sorridente sempre pronta ad aiutarti per qualsiasi esigenza. Non sarà possibile dimenticarli. Grazie
Heel gastvrije ontvangst. Vervoer naar tombes en andere locaties werd vlot geregeld. Mooi uitzien van de kamer en perfecte ligging nabij fijne horeca.

The staff is very friendly, pleasant and helpful. They even prepared our room earlier and had no problem with our earlier check-in (I have informed them beforehand).
The location is excellent, close to the center and yet very calm.
review.comment_negative:
The shower didn't flow well. The shower head has weak stream of water.
There was dirty towel on the floor in front of our bathroom. I think they forgot to remove it when they prepared our room.
They could give us 2 more towels - one on the floor in the bathroom and one for hand wash.

review.rating: Séjour agréable, prix très abordable et accueil chaleureux.
review.comment_positive:
L'accueil très chaleur de notre hôte.
La localisation. 
Le petit petit-déjeuner était très bon.
review.comment_negative: L'isolement n'était pas terrible, nous entendions un peu de bruit et surtout l'humidité et le froid passaient à travers les fenêtres. Donc si vous y allez en période de forte je pense que ça ne posera pas problème puisqu'il y a la climatisation en revanche en février à 16/20° s'il pleut il risque de faire froid.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Le meilleur rapport qualité/prix que nous aillons eu au Vietnam.
L'accueil était parfait, avec une boisson de bienvenue et des conseils pour visiter Hue.
Nous avions 2 chambres pour nous et nos enfants et les 2 étaient propres, spacieuse et avec une bonne literie.
Je recommande!
Gentillesse du personnel , emplacement

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: This was a lovely property in a very convenient location. It was in an alley and walkable to tons of things! They were super helpful getting things set up and just a lovely family!
Freundlicher Empfang. Gute Lage in die Innenstadt.

El hotel está muy bien ubicado, limpio y la atención por parte de la familia que lo dirige es excelente, la chica muy atenta.  Los desayunos eran buenos. La piscina estaba metida entre paredes, no puedes tumbarte pero estaba muy limpia e ideal para pegarte un baño después de andar todo el día por la ciudad. Calidad precio excelente.
Chị chủ nhiệt tình thân thiện.
Der Ausblick, der Platz im Zimmer. Es fehlte an nichts
great location and lovely room, great value for money

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: L'accueil très chaleureux de Laura et Mikael. Les conseils de Laura sur les bons plans restos, bars et visites. L'hôtel super bien placé à deux pas des restaurants et des bars mais dans une petite rue très calme (hormis le coq du quartier).

La atención de la dueña es excelente, amable y servicial. 
La habitación es amplia e iluminada. Tiene todo lo que uno necesita

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Nous avons quitté ce logement avec un pincement au cœur ! Merci à toute la famille pour cet accueil si chaleureux, cette gentillesse, cette bienveillance ...  le petit déjeuner est délicieux, les chambres sont confortables...

A quelques pas des restos, il faut marcher une bonne 30aine de minutes pour aller à la cité imperiale mais cela se fait sans soucis! Nous avons pu compter sur eux pour nous trouver un chauffeur pour visiter les tombeaux à un prix raisonnable.
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour ici et ne pouvons que conseiller de vous arrêter ici !

review.comment_negative:
trên khăn tắm có lông nhìn rất dơ 
giường có phân thằn lằn và phân gián 
máy lạnh không lạnh 
vệ sinh kém ngủ dậy bị mẫn ngứa 
dịch vụ thuê xe cũng không tốt, mình thuê cả ngay nhưng sáng đi về để xe ở dưới chìu lại không có xe làm chậm việc của mình rất nhiều, mình phản ánh thì khách sạn đổ lỗi cho nhân viên và thậm chí còn có ý trách ngược lại minh và không có ý xin lỗi.

review.comment_positive: These guys have a PhD in hospitality

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Nos trataron genial, Laura y su familia.
Se nos retrasó el vuelo y llegamos cerca de las 00.30 , sin problema nos hicieron el check in.
La relación calidad -precio estupenda, los desayunos buenísimos, buena ubicación y se ofrecen a ayudarte en todo lo que está de su mano.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công

review.comment_positive:
Laura est une hôtesse exceptionnelle ainsi que toute sa famille, ils ont été aux petits soins pendant toute la durée de notre séjour. Nous n’avons jamais reçu de tel accueil et nous vous remercions sincèrement pour toutes les informations que vous nous avez données et la facilité avec laquelle nous pouvions réserver un taxi. 
Le petit déjeuner est excellent et fait maison. 
La famille est souriante et on s’y sent comme à la maison.

review.rating: Séjour parfait excellent accueil et bon emplacement
review.comment_positive: La chambre propre et confortable, le petit dejeuner, l'accueil et la gentillesse de notre hôte

La hospitalidad de Laura y su familia. Además de la excelente ubicación, estás cerca de todo caminando a menos de 5 minutos. Es cómodo y tranquilo. Pero más allá de eso, el cariño, la excelente disposición y la amabilidad de Laura y su familia, te hacen sentir calor de hogar. Te ayudan en todo lo que necesitas y además están atentos para que te sientas cómodo.
atención genial de toda la familia. Desayuno muy rico y nos ayudaron a contactar con un chofer para visitar la tumbas mas alejadas

review.rating: Good value for money just the job
review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Great location friendly helpful staff

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
El hotel está ubicado en el centro de Hue, muy cerca de todas las tiendas y de la Ciudadela.
Laura la encargada del hotel es muy amable y te ayuda en todo lo que necesitas (planning, recomendaciones, transfers etc).
Relación calidad-precio perfecto.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive:
Laura fue muy amable y atenta con nosotros en todo momento. 
El sitio era tranquilo por las noches y poder descansar. 
Hay neverita en la habitación,  AACC y un balconcito.
Laura es un amor. Siempre dispuesta a ayudarnos. Un desayuno sin miserias. En condiciones. La habitación también bien. Early check in

review.rating: bestes Hotel in Hue, sehr zu empfehlen!
review.comment_positive:
Wenn ich 20 Sterne vergeben könnte würde ich das tun. Mit Abstand die netteste und hilfsbereiteste Gastgeberin, die wir jemals getroffen haben. Wir haben ganz unerwartet ein kostenloses Upgrade des Zimmers bekommen, welches sehr schön war! Riesige Fenster und sehr hell und gemütlich und sauber und ruhig. Es gab einen leckeren Welcome Smoothie und Früchte bei der Ankunft. Wir durften am Abreisetag unser Gepäck stehen lassen und vor unserer Nachtzugreise noch kurz duschen, herrlich! Dann wurden wir sogar bis zur Strasse zu unserem Grab gebracht und dort verabschiedet. 
Laura, du bist ein wundervoller Mensch, vielen Dank für all deine Mühe. Wir wünschen dir und deiner Familie nur das Beste!

review.rating: El mejor lugar para quedarse en Hue
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: El alojamiento estaba en una zona muy comoda. Cerca de la calle principal de pubs y ambiente pero alejado para que no se escuchara nada de ruido. Tienen servicio de alquiler de bicicleta y moto (nosotros alquilamos moto) y todo fue muy bien. El desayuno estaba muy bien, y lo mejor de todo fue Laura y su marido. Fueron encantadores y muy serviciales. Nos dejaron entrar con las maletas antes de tiempo y el dia que nos ibamos pudimos dejarlas en recepcion.

La habitación era espaciosa con una cama super comoda, ducha con agua caliente funcionando en perfectas condiciones, lugar super tranquilo en las noches y una familia increíblemente amable y hospitalaria, ellos conocen bien la ciudad y dan recomendaciones muy buenas de los lugares importantes en Hue. El desayuno era muy bueno y bien variado.

The room and place was great! We had a cute balcony and a big window which we liked really much. We loved the host and she was so sweet and helpful. We were able to check in early and we even had a welcome breakfast. The breakfast was always really good also! She helped us organize our next destination really quickly.

Quiet location, perfect view into a garden with a panorama window, very new furniture, everything was clean. Laura is a very friendly and lovely person and helps you with everything. We got fruit when we arrived and the breakfast was very good.
She recommended a vegetarian local restaurant to us, which was good and inexpensive. We had a nice time in Hue. Thank you very much!

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Gia đình chị chủ rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình và đáng mến. Chúng tôi là gia đình và được ở 1 nơi như gia đình. Vị trí KS thì thuận tiện, đi đâu cũng gần, gần phố đi bộ. Do về nhà bà con nên kết thúc lịch sớm tại KS nhưng 1 ngày cũng đủ rất thích. Cảm ơn Gia đình Anh Chị chủ!!!

Semplicemente perfetti. Staff meraviglioso, camere pulitissime, ottima posizione e ottima colazione. Rapporto qualità prezzo eccellente.
Assolutamente consigliato.

The room was lovely, and the owner even more! She helped us with everything, she booked for us the Paradise Cave tour, she helped with taxi and transportation. Such a lovely person. I highly recommend it:)

Thank you, Laura, for your kindness and hospitality. It was so great to spend some time in your homestay. I highly recommend this place - nice rooms, delicious coffee and breakfast and fantastic hosts!
chị chủ dễ thương, nhiệt tình. chỗ ở sạch sẽ. gần trung tâm. sẽ quay lại

Everything since the begining was perfect, we felt like at home.
Just arrived at 7:00 in the morning, they gave us a free breakfast and the chance to chek-in at 9:00
The family of the homestay is super nice and kind, the rooms are well equiped, confy bed and all clean. The location is fantastic.
The room was small but clean. The bathroom was very nice. The included breakfast was great! The location is pretty central and you can rent a motorbike from the hotel.
review.comment_negative: The bed was a bit hard. Only one person working there speaks good English, so if like us you arrive when she is not there, it is a bit hard to organise anything through them!

review.rating: a personal and caring place to stay with kind people
review.comment_positive: This Homestay is run by the loveliest family. Michael and Laura made us feel a part of their extended family and genuinely cared for us during our 3 days with them. the breakfast was delicious!
review.comment_negative: I didn’t realise I should put out the sign on our door to have our room serviced- entirely my own fault!

review.rating: Familiär, gastfreundlich, angenehm und kleiner Wohlfühlort
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Vermutlich die gastfreundlichste und familiäre Unterkunft, die wir in drei Wochen Vietnam gebucht hatten. Beide mega hilfsbereit. Frühstück lecker - immer mit Obstteller. Super flexibel - konnten um eine Nacht verlängern. Gibt gute Restaurant-Empfehlungen und hat uns einen Fahrer für die Kaisergräber organisiert.
review.comment_negative: Letzte Nacht haben wir in einem anderen Zimmer geschlafen, da war es relativ laut - mit Ohropax ging es gut und im anderen Zimmer war das gar kein Thema (bis auf den Hahn des Nachbarn :))

review.comment_positive: Sehr freundliche Besitzer. Super hilfsbereit und toller Service. Roller zu günstigen Preisen zu mieten.

review.rating: Superb service and value, perfect location, amazing hospitality.
review.comment_positive: Chose this hotel purely due to the exceptionally high reviews and now we know why. Amazing service by the proprieter and her family, hotel was new and modern, and location was fantastic, just off a main road next to the main shopping streets. Highly recommended for a quaint experience and incredible value for money.
review.comment_negative: Just note that in usual vietnamese style, the shower area is not fully enclosed, and there is no holder for toiletries.

review.rating: A simple stay in a good spot of town
review.comment_positive:
- great location (slightly off the busy roads)
- super nice staff (gave us the option of early checkin)
- room was all we needed (right value for money with a comfy bed, and quite small space)
- walking distance to the bridge leading to the citadel & close to main bars/restaurant street

El personal súper amable, te ofrecían una bebida y fruta de bienvenida. Nos ayudaron con el alquiler de la moto, que era muy económica. Muy cómodo y muy cerca del centro de la ciudad. El agua de la piscina, al no darle el sol, estaba fresca, lo cual se agradece debido a las altas temperaturas y la humedad del país.
review.comment_negative: La piscina esta un poco empotrada entre paredes, y para llegar al alojamiento tienes que meterte por un callejón poco iluminado.

review.comment_positive: Sympathie et accueil des patrons et du personnel. Nous sommes partis sous le déluge, les propriétaires nous ont aidés, sacs, capes, sacs plastiques aux  pieds... Tellement il pleuvait. Des gens super gentils. Petit déjeuner au top.
Laura and her husband were great hosts! They made our stay incredible <3 From early check-in, extra breakfast to quick laundry. The room was bright, clean and comfortable.

-super freundliche Inhaberin
-durfte bereits um morgens einchecken (kamen mit dem Nachtbus aus ninh binh) und haben Frühstück bekommen
-Zimmer und Bad sehr sauber
-Lage gut und ruhig
-Tipps für Sightseeing und Restaurants
-Organisation der Weiterfahrt mit dem Roller nach Hoi An (kann im Hotel gebucht werden, Gepäck wird separat transportiert)
-Preis-Leistungsverhältnis unschlagbar
review.comment_negative:
-Matratze war (wie häufiger in Vietnam) etwas hart
-Ein paar Ablageflächen im Zimmer für das Gepäck wären super

review.comment_positive: Central but quiet street. Very flexible staff : we asked for breakfast at 5am and it was no problem.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.rating: Genoten van ons verblijf in Hué!!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Heel behulpzame eigenaars die heel lief zijn. ‘s morgens aangekomen met slaapbus en mochten al direct mee een gratis ontbijtje (lekker!) mee-eten. Rustig gelegen maar dicht in centrum. We regelen via hen een scooter + oneway scooter trip naar Hoi An en de bagage werd apart meegenomen door hen.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay in the Hue For Seasons Hotel. We arrived early with the night bus and were greeted by the lovely staff with a banana shake and fresh fruits. Afterwards we were able to immediately check into our room which was absolutely great after the long bus ride.The room was clean and had a small balcony. For breakfast Laura granted us every wish we had and helped us otherwise with good tips around the city and beyond. We can definitely recommend this hotel for your stay in Hue

the owner are amazing. they are so caring and really make your stay perfect! breakfast was good and the rooms were nice and clean. location is also good as it's just around the corner from the night walking street. would definitely stay there again!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive:
Große Zimmer, alles sehr sauber und gepflegt.
Frühstück war super, man konnte immer nachbestellen.
Kleiner Pool zum erfrischen ist auch dabei.
Die Familie ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit!! Hilfe bei Tickets für den Zug, Ausflug,.... 
Würden auf alle Fälle wieder kommen und können das Four Season ohne Bedenken weiterempfehlen!!

review.rating: the staff was wonderful! helpful, kind and friendly
review.comment_positive: the location

review.rating: Très bon moment à Hue chez Laura et sa famille!
review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Super séjour, on a été très bien accueillis et conseillés pour visiter la région. Laura et sa famille sont d’une grande gentillesse! Petit déj et emplacement au top.
review.comment_negative: Lits peu confortables mais corrects pour un court séjour

review.rating: Sad to leave. Loved our stay!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The warm welcome and hospitality from start to finish! Laura was an amazing host. Breakfast was many choices. Room was lovely. Beds super comfy. Will be back!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Laura et sa famille sont très accueillants et sont pleins d'attention. Nous avons pu faire un early check in, et laisser nos bagages en attendant de prendre notre train le soir. L'emplacement est très bien, avec des restaurants autour et à 20 minutes de la citadelle. C'est situé dans une petite rue, donc il n'y a pas le bruit de la circulation. La petite piscine est top!

review.rating: Not far from the Citadelle, but I'd choose another hotel for better comfort and stay!
review.comment_positive: The staff is very friendly. Very kind and helpful. The location (near the Citadel) is also a positive point.
review.comment_negative: Although the staff is very friendly, we didn't like the hotel because of the neighborhood. We couldn't sleep well because of the noisy people around the hotel. Although the hotel isn't on the main street, it's still very noisy because of the bars that close very late (they keep cleaning the bars until 2 am, shouting and laughing loudly). There was also construction work going on around the hotel which caused a lot of noise. Another negative point is the pool, which is tiny.

review.rating: A lovely hotel in the back lanes of the hotel district with lovely district views. The staff were lovely and helpful. Wo
review.comment_positive: A comfortable space with great district views, easy walk to everything. The staff were lovely.

review.rating: Very good value for your money!
review.comment_positive: Laura and her family are very welcoming. They want to make sure that your trip is as easy as possible. Breakfast is good, room is nice, location is close to the streets with restaurants and bars, the citadel is about 30 minutes walking (the walk alongside the river is nice!).

review.rating: This has been the best stay we’ve had since our time traveling in Vietnam. I have booked other inexpensive hotels and I
review.comment_positive: the best property we’ve stayed at during our trip to Vietnam. Spacious room, warm water with excellent water pressure, clean facilities and very very helpful and accommodating staff. best of all the AC unit actually worked in this room. it was our safe haven when we wanted to escape the busy streets and heat of the city.
review.comment_negative: we loved everything about this hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive:
it was perfect ! the room was really clean , the owners are really nice and friendly. 
it was my best experience in Vietnam. cam on

Laura and her family are the perfect hosts! 
So lovely people who will arrange tours and help with everything you need.
The breakfast was great.
The location even better 🫶 Close to everything!
review.comment_negative: Since the place is in the middle of everything, there is a lot of noise from traffic, cocks and dogs. Remember good earplugs and you'll be fine 😃

review.comment_positive: Las instalaciones están muy bien y bastante nuevo todo.
review.comment_negative: La limpieza de las sábanas y del baño es mejorable.

review.rating: The best we've stayed at this trip.
review.comment_positive:
Amazing hotel! 

The host, Laura was incredible. She sat us down, got us a drink and gave us something to eat when we arrived early and soaked from the rain. Then we were able to check in early.
She was always attentive, helpful and did everything to ensure we had a great stay. 

The location is great for food options and nightlife. Located at the end of an alley, it's one of the few properties we encountered free of the sound of traffic and loud music. 
The Citadel is around 2km or a 5 minute taxi ride that cost around 30k VND. 

This felt more like being welcomed home after a long trip than checking in at a hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công

review.rating: Grâce à Laura, on s’est senti comme à la maison!
review.comment_positive: Laura est une patronne solaire, toujours avec le sourire , prête à nous aider et trouver des solutions. Tte sa famille nous a accueilli avec beaucoup de gentillesse !

Llegamos muy pronto en tren desde Ninh Binh y hacía muy mal tiempo...nos recibieron en su casa, nos dejaron instalarnos según llegamos, ducharnos e incluso nos dieron de desayunar...Laura y su familia fueron muy cariñosos con nosotros, nos trataron de 10. Incluso nos facilitaron una manera mejor y más barata de la que teníamos pensada para ir a Hoi An. En cuanto a la habitación era muy espaciosa, limpia y tranquila. El hotel está situado en un sitio céntrico con mucha oferta de restauración cerca. El desayuno casero muy rico.

Staff is super nice, friendly and helpful.
Breakfast is delicious.

review.rating: Great value for money with great hosts.
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was fantastic, not just Vietnamese food but also  omletes and scrambled egg. It was included with the room.excellent value, located pretty close to town, taxis cyclops were at the top of the drive. Hosts Laura and Micheal couldn’t do enough for you. We are looking forward to returning in the not too distant future!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Hue four seasons hotel, is beautiful,  when l arrived, l was early and dripping wet, Laura took me straight to my room to change and dry off. Wow! My room has wall to sealing windows, and the view omg! Outstanding. I had the room with baloney. It was in a perfect location. I walked to the Imperial City. Found a great shopping plaza. Lots of shops, food, coffee shops and restaurants, all around us. Breaky was yum! Hosts where amazing 👏 highly recommended.

From the first moment I felt very welcome and liked the place. The owner family is very friendly and helpful.
I get a free upgrade to a room with balcony, the room was spacious and the bathroom looked very new.
The location is very close to the pedestrian area with the bars, but also good if you want to walk to the palace.
Breakfast was great :)
Kind and welcoming hosts, lovely room (we were upgraded at no extra cost) and a great choice of breakfast options.
Simple breakfast, comfortable, attractive room. not expensive.

review.rating: Great location, friendly hosts and great banana pancakes.
review.comment_positive: Great location in quiet area. Short walk to the bars and restaurants. Really friendly and helpful hosts. Breakfast was good, especially the banana pancakes.
review.comment_negative: Rooms are a bit tired, but still clean and comfortable.

tudo muito bom! quarto grande, limpo, cheiroso, banheiro bom! café da manhã delicioso! localização ótima também !! O staff é INCRÍVEL! amamos o hotel

Laura and her family are really hospitable. My room was clean, the bed is comfy, but the A/C didn't heat. Breakfast was also satisfactory. The location is good and quite, but be aware of the pimps in the neighbor streets.
review.comment_negative: There were some communication failure and misunderstandings about the organized tours and attractions (which actually made this to my worse period of my whole travelling).

review.comment_positive: Personnel très aimable et attentionné. Très bons déjeuners. Situé dans un quartier animé et à proximité de la Citadelle.

review.comment_positive: Ok
The owner and her family! They are very friendly and helpful! I really recommend to stay with them.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công

review.comment_positive:
Excellent rapport qualité prix ! C'est entre l'hôtel et la maison d'hôtes. Laura a toujours été a nos petits soins, elle nous a offert le petit déjeuner. 
Emplacement au cœur de la ville qui nous a permis de faire beaucoup de choses à pieds (citadelle, marché...)
La piscine est très appréciable pour se rafraîchir au vu des fortes chaleurs que nous avons eu
La habitación genial y Laura la dueña muy amable.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Super emplacement, super accueil! Merci Laura pour ton sourire!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tout, un très bel accueil, une chambre lumineuse, une salle de bain.impeccable et un fort bon petit-déjeuner.  La famille qui tient le homestay est particulièrement sympathique. Four seasons est située dans une impasse dans un quartier animé.

review.rating: Tolles Hotel, gute Tipps, nette Besitzer, perfekte Lage
review.comment_positive: Die Besitzer sind sehr freundlich, das Begrüßungsgetränk war sehr lecker. Die Zimmer waren sehr sauber. Die Lage vom Hotel ist perfekt. Wir waren mit den Fahrrädern unterwegs und durften die Fahrräder über Nacht ins Restaurant stellen. Wenn wir wieder nach Hue kommen, werden wir auf jeden Fall wieder hier ein Zimmer buchen.

review.rating: Die Hilfsbereitschaft der Besitzer war unglaublich!
review.comment_positive: Die Unterkunft war sauber und die Eigentümer waren total lieb. Wir kamen morgens um 7 Uhr an und bekamen umsonst Frühstück und ein Zimmerupgrade! Sie hat uns viele Tipps gegeben wie man was in der Stadt besichtigen kann und einen Roller konnte man für einen kleinen Preis mieten. Als ich gefragt habe wo man Postmarken bekommen kann hat sie sofort angeboten welche zu besorgen! Auch die Lage war total gut!
It was honestly lovely, the staff were so kind and the room was clean and just lovely

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Zelo prijeten hotel s prijazno gostiteljico. Dobra lokacija, okusen zajtrk in hiter internet.

review.rating: lovely hosts, facilities could use an upgrade
review.comment_positive: this place is run by a lovely family who could not do more to help you. decent location as well!
review.comment_negative: the bathroom didn’t have any ventilation so was extremely humid, this meant that the whole bedroom was damp. the aircon didn’t help dry things out at all (it was quite old). it made for a rather uncomfortable stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Une charmante famille vous accueillera dans se petit établissement. On s'y sent très bien dès les premiers instants. La chambre est spacieuse et lumineuse.
review.comment_negative: Le lit est assez dur mais on dirait que c'est assez récurant au Vietnam. La piscine est fonctionnelle mais manque un peu de charme. Elle est entourée de mur et donc aucun emplacement pour se poser autour.

review.rating: Adorable stall and pick-up a perfect locar

review.rating: highly recommend for a stay in Hue
review.comment_positive: Owned by a lovely family. Welcome drink and fruits, we got a free upgrade with a nice view on the parfume river. Breakfast is yummy and we were also allowed to use a shower after check-out before we took our night train. Well located in the city center but very silent as it is in a small street in the backyard. This is a 11/10 stay in Hue.

review.rating: I was so pleased to stay in there one day, it’s perfect place for family and solo travelers
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

We had a great stay at Four Seasons. The staff were very welcoming, friendly and helpful. The value for money here is hard to beat, particularly with breakfast included and had a lovely family run feel.
review.comment_negative: The hot water was a bit unreliable, it was hot to start but did not last long. Some unfinished electrical wires in our room too. But for the price and great team, this is definitely a great place to stay.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công

review.comment_positive:
We stayed two times in the four season Hotel and loved it! The first time we were a group of 5 and even though we were way to early, we've got a really warm welcome and could check in directly.
We had a family room and the view and balcony were amazing!
The second time the host recognised us directly and was happy to see us again. She helped us to organise our Visarun to Lao Bao Border.
The breakfast is really good and you can chose as many things as you want from the menu.
Thank you very much for the warm welcome and the pleasant stay!
Bettina and Richard
amazing place to stay!

Very nice room
Lovely host

Ik werd enorm warm welkom geheten, met een heerlijk bord fruit en een glas met verse fruitsap. Het hotel heeft een hele huiselijke en vredige sfeer. De kamer was heel schoon en in de badkamer vond ik fijne grote handdoeken. Het ontbijt was top. Nadat ik had uitgecheckt, wilde ik nog op pad gaan in Hue en ik kon mijn bagage achterlaten. Ook kon ik nog douchen voordat ik ging reizen naar mijn volgende bestemming terwijl ik al uitgecheckt was, super fijn! In de omgeving van het hotel tref je ook veel restaurants en andere voorzieningen aan. Dit hotel raad ik iedereen aan die het mooie Hue wil verkennen!

Das Personal und der Service sind hier etwas ganz  besonderes. Das Preis- Leistungsverhältnis ist super, die Zimmer sind toll, das Frühstück grandios. 

Besten Dank Laura & Familie
review.comment_negative: Das Bett war sogar für mich etwas hart. Es ist ein bisschen weicher als ein Futon.

review.comment_positive: Das Hotel ist sehr schön und das Personal sehr freundlich und möchte einem bei allem helfen, sehr nett. Auch das Frühstück ist sehr lecker und man kann jederzeit nachbestellen.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.rating: Best stay with the nicest people
review.comment_positive: Very clean, Very light because of the big windows, very friendly and helpful staff. Good breakfast. I could leave my luggage. It felt like home away from home

review.rating: Best place to stay, not only in Huế, but in the whole of Vietnam, maybe the world!
review.comment_positive: Genuinely everything was perfect about this stay! The place and the location was supernice, the price was totally reasonable and the breakfast was amazing! However the best part were the family running this place, saying that they were nice does not cut it, they were the some of the most well meaning and inclusive people I have ever met! They can help you with almost anything, for example; they made a cake for my girlfriend on her birthday and had her name written on it, and it seems like they genuinely enjoy doing things like this! 100/10 would stay again without a doubt, make sure to tip them well when checking out, payment by card is possible!
review.comment_negative: Nothing a single little thing was bad

review.comment_positive: Cô chủ thân thiện

Laura gave us a warm welcome (cold drinks and fresh-cutted fruits while checking-in) and had our luggage carried directly into our room (which has been upgraded as it was low season). It was a good surprise ! The room was quite big, nice and clean. Large windows, little balcony, A/C + fan, small fridge, kettle, everything you might need. And if you're missing something, Laura is the most helpful host. I was sick during my stay and she made sure I had everything I needed. She even prepared ginger tea for me to feel better. We stayed 2 nights and they refreshed the room the second day. Great sense of hospitality. Laura helped us booking excursion and bus. She also recommended places to see and nearby restaurants to eat at. Her kindness was exceeding our expectations!
review.comment_negative:
No air conditioning in the bathroom, can be very hot.
Non eco-friendly single use pod shampoo, could be replaced by refillable bottles.
We haven't seen the pool (but also forgot to ask about it), maybe it could be indicated in the welcome speech..

review.comment_positive: Fijn hotel op een ideale plek. Laura en haar familie zijn hele vriendelijke en gastvrije mensen. Veel keus bij het ontbijt!

La estancia en este hotel ha sido de las mejores del viaje a Vietnam 😄

La habitación era incluso mejor de lo que pensábamos y había mucha calma lo que se agradece después de venir de  ciudades como Hanói, encima nos recibieron con un zumo y frutita 😍. A esto hay que sumarle un desayuno increíble, eliges en una carta lo que quieres y nosotros pedimos unos crepes de plátano y chocolate deliciosos. Pero lo mejor del hotel sin duda es todo su personal, y no podemos no mencionar a Laura que nos ha dado unas recomendaciones buenísimas y encima nos ha ayudado un montón con el bus que teníamos que coger para llegar a Hoi An.

Tenéis que elegir este hotel si vais a Hue, no os vais a arrepentir.

review.rating: Lieu idéal, bon rapport qualité/prix et l'hôte est vraiment gentille
review.comment_positive: La gentillesse de notre hôte, elle était toujours disponible pour m'aider à réserver et planifier mon voyage. Elle a vraiment tout fait pour que nous passions un bon séjour et pour que l'on soit à l'aise (j'ai pu faire mon check-in à 08.00 du matin).
siêu thích

Bon petit déjeuner. 
Je recommande cet hôtel.
the owners are really kind and helpful:)

review.rating: Zentrale, helle Unterkunft mit grossartigen Gastgebern.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Das grosse, sehr helle Zimmer konnte mit einer grossartigen Aussicht, einem bequemen (eher harten) Bett, vielen Ablagemöglichkeiten und einem grossen Bad punkten. Die Lage der Unterkunft ist optimal. Laura ist eine absolut liebe und zuvorkommende Gastgeberin. Sie hat unsere Weiterfahrt nach Hoi An organisiert und wir konnten bei ihr günstig einen guten Motorroller mieten. Die Wäsche macht sie zu einem Spitzenpreis.
Unser Zimmer wurde täglich gebettet und frische Handtücher bereitgelegt.
Das Frühstück war einfach lecker!
review.comment_negative:
Der Abfluss im Badezimmer ist etwas ungünstig gemacht - das Bad ist quasi prädestiniert zum Überlaufen. 
Mit den chicen Badelatschen aber kein Problem.

review.rating: Hue selbst hat uns bisher auf unserer Reise am wenigsten gefallen, das mag an der Hitze gelegen haben mit anschließendem
review.comment_positive:
Lage ist gut, wir durften viel früher einchecken. Laura begrüßte uns mit Saft und Obst.  
Für eine Nacht wirklich eine gute Adresse.
Wir konnten unkompliziert und preiswert unsere Weiterfahrt nach Hoi An aus vom
Hotel buchen.  
Frühstück war gut, man muss aber auswählen. Zweiter Kaffee war kein Problem.  Ist nicht üblich, manchmal muss man den zusätzlich zahlen.
Địa điểm ở trung tâm. Nhân viên rất nhiệt tình.
Nice and cozy room, very friendly staff, delicious breakfast, good location

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.rating: Thank you for a lovely stay in Hue!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Lovely place with such kind staff. They were awesome with our kids and very helpful when I locked myself out, twice! Great brekkie and great location. Excellent value for money!
Super modern und sauber, für uns als Backpacker war das Preis- Leistungsverhältnis super. Alles war sauber und ordentlich. Die Besitzer waren außerordentlich freundlich und das Zimmer war super.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Très bien placé
Les hôtes sont très accueillants et peuvent organiser vos journées et transferts

review.rating: Charming hotel has been the highlight of our trip so far
review.comment_positive:
The host was very attentive & accommodating despite the fact I booked the wrong dates and arrived a day later than expected.  
Further, on arrival we were granted an early check in at no extra cost. Price also includes a modest but tasty breakfast including a drink of choice. 

Its abundantly clear that Laura, the host, cares deeply about the welfare of her clientele by offering a genuine trustworthy service in every aspect and there is no need to feel that there is any catch in what is being provided, which made our short stay all fairly relaxed.

The location is perfect because its a short walk from the main strip and where the buses drop off but far away enough that it is also quiet at night.

We had our laundry done via the hotel and it was quite reasonably priced, very prompt and our clothes were returned fresh. 

We took a moto for half a day and were charged accordingly at a half days rate.

Its important to note that this is a family run business who work hard & take pride in their service and generally speaking, not just for this hotel but for all across Vietnam, one should simply manage their expectations of what is realistic when it comes to any type or accommodation.

if you’re looking for a clean quiet secure space with a host that cares about your experience, then stay here! 

Given the above, this has arguably been the best place we stayed in our entire trip.

review.rating: Personnel très agréable et belle vue de la chambre
review.comment_positive:

Bien situé

review.comment_positive: The hospitality. Very friendly helpfully smiley family. we loved the place. My daughter from 3 years loves the family and the place.
The staff was super lovely, helped us plan our further travels, made us feel at home. Delicious, fresh breakfast. The hotel itself was very cosy.

review.comment_positive: Laura est une hôte très attentionnée et serviable, n'hésitez pas à lui demander conseil elle connaît toujours quelqu'un pour vous y amener. Le logement est bien situé , confortable, très proche du centre ville. Et quand il pleut elle nous a prêté des parapluies.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

Elevator, breakfast included, private bathroom, nice bed and even a fridge. Owner will help you if you have any questions around town. They helped me book a cheaper taxi with a company that didn't scam me and even invited me to a free family lunch at some point. Thanks 🙏🏼

Merci encore aux hôtes de nous avoir fait passer un excellent début de séjour au Vietnam !

Very nice hotell, with super friendly and helpful staff. The room had a beautiful interior and a little balcony. The hotel is in a great location in the tourist area but in a little alley with no traffic, which was very relaxing. Comfy for a good price. I enjoyed my stay and can recommend.

review.comment_positive: The family who runs this homestay is so nice and lovely. Our room was really clean and quiet. Highly recommand!

review.comment_positive:
Very warm hospitality!

We kregen direct een upgrade van kamer. We werden ontvangen door een ontzettend vriendelijke dame. De kamer is ruim, fantastisch uitzicht en een klein balkon. Er is een klein zwembad, vooral prima voor een snelle plons om op te frissen tijdens een warme dag.

review.comment_negative: No funcionaba el aire, no había casi enchufes

review.rating: Fantastic place to stay in Hue in a great location.
review.comment_positive: Amazing stay. Arrived in the morning after a sleeper bus, we planned to drop our bags off and when we arrived the Lady who runs the hotel was so lovely and offered us a welcome breakfast which was great. We then were able to leave our bags before checking in. The owner was so friendly and made us feel so welcome, she couldn't do enough for us and always remembered our names. The room was very clean with huge windows, there was a fridge and storage space and the shower was warm too. Breakfast was a choice of different eggs with a baguette,  pancakes, noodle soup and all came with fruit plus hot drinks and juice, a perfect way to start the day. The hotel helped us rent a motorbike and then also helped with our transfer to Hoi An - they couldn't have been more accommodating. Great location, near to lots of restaurants, cafes and shops. Would definitely stay here again.
review.comment_negative: A shelf in the shower would've been a great added extra but didn't affect our stay at all. But other than that it was a brilliant stay.

review.comment_positive:
Llegamos al hotel a las 06:30h de la mañana porque nuestro autobús se adelantó unas cuantas horas y nos recibieron con té, fruta fresca y nos hicieron el check in a esa misma hora, fue un detallazo! 
La habitación estaba impecable, tal cual se ve en las fotos, la ubicación del hotel genial también y el desayuno buenísimo.
Alquilamos una moto para el Hai Van Pass con ellos (y nos llevaron el equipaje) y todo perfecto.
Un 10 de sitio y un 100 de trato!
The breakfast was very great, the room clean and the employees very nice! They helped us to book the bus tickets and to organize our activities. Totally recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Owner was one of the kindest people we’ve met, she helped us with our issues and we accidentally came for our luggage late and she was very nice about it. She also helped us organize airport transportation but the driver was extremely pushy so avoid Thai Binh Thien Quoc if possible and make sure not to commit to a specific driver for the day (they will keep asking).
review.comment_negative: toilet didn’t flush and made a noise the entire time - they never fixed it after we told them. The shower was also a constant temp and couldn’t change it

review.comment_positive: La habitación fue muy cómoda, limpia. La propietaria nos trató súper bien y nos ayudó en todo. Está muy bien ubicado. los desayunos buenísimos

review.rating: Loved the city of Hue and our accommodation was perfect. Would go back in a heart beat.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was simple but delicious.  Laura (or was it Lauren?) was a delight. So kind and welcoming and incredibly helpful. The other staff were also incredibly good natured and happy.  The vibe was awesome.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Lara was wonderful, even preparing traditional food and tea because one of us was very ill when we arrived.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Mooie, ruime kamer met goeie airco en mooi uitzicht. Lekker ontbijt. Supervriendelijke host die ons met alles hielp! Leuk, klein, verfrissend zwembad. Best value for money!
review.comment_negative: Hotel is gelegen in een klein, wat donker steegje. Aparte handdoeken voor het zwembad waren leuk geweest.

review.rating: Everything was nice, host was very helpful and friendly

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn gần trung tâm rất thuận tiện, phòng sạch sẽ, rộng rãi. Chị chủ rất nhiệt tình.

Khách sạn ngay gần trung tâm. Phòng đẹp, thoải mái, tiện nghi. Một điều rất quan trọng phải nói là: ANH CHỊ CHỦ SIÊU SIÊU DỄ THƯƠNG VÀ NHIỆT TÌNH, chu đáo từ lúc gd mình chưa đến (gọi điện trc hỏi thời gian đến để cbi phòng) đến lúc trả phòng về luôn ạ. Chuyến này mình đi nghỉ 3 tỉnh, mà thật sự đây là nơi mình ưng nhất luôn ạ 😍 nếu quay lại Huế chắc chắn sẽ lại book ở đây và giới thiệu bạn bè qua đây. Ai ko chọn ở đây là siêu tiếc luôn ấy ạ 😆
review.comment_negative: TV mình ko xem đc. Mà ko sao 😁mình đi chơi là chủ yếu.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: ruhige Lage, super Frühstück, sehr nettes Personal

Laura and her team were brilliant. So helpful. On arrival they gave us complimentary juice and fruit, which really helped.
Hotel organized taxi collection at airport. Simple and relatively cheap.
We booked a DMZ tour through Laura and it was good / well organized.
The small pool out back was pleasant - the sun is on it in the afternoon.
Food was good. Room was great. 5-10 minute walk to the main parts of Hue. 
The small road is relatively quiet considering how close to the city it is.

review.rating: A nice stay in the busy city of Hue
review.comment_positive: The owners of this hotel really makes you feel like at home :) Room was a little bit small but with large windows overlooking the city. Very nice and clean bathroom with a big shower! Also location is very convinient to reach the imperial city of Hue and still be away from the busy streets.
review.comment_negative: the bed was a little bit too hard for my taste but still passable!

review.comment_positive: chỗ ở sạch sẽ thoáng mát yên tĩnh

review.rating: Familiäre Unterkunft mitten in Hue (und trotzdem ruhig!)
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Wir waren schon zum 3. Mal bei Laura und ihrer Familie und werden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen. Die Zimmer sind komfortabel und blitzblank, aber fast noch besser ist die Herzlichkeit, mit der wir vom ersten Besuch an empfangen werden. Ganz klare Empfehlung hier zu übernachten!

review.rating: Des hôtes aux petits soins au cœur de Hué
review.comment_positive: On a particulièrement aimé la gentillesse et la disponibilité du personnel, ainsi que l’emplacement.
review.comment_negative: Lorsque nous sommes arrivés tardivement, il y avait une petite fuite dans la salle de bain. Ce n’était pas idéal, mais Laura a tout fait pour régler ce problème au plus vite, et nous a fait une réduction sur le prix de la chambre à la fin.

review.comment_positive:
Les hôtes sont aux petits soins et donnent pleins de conseils pour explorer Hué et ses environs ! Très bon petit déj ! Location de scooter possible sur place. À 2 pas de restaurants (tous types de restau : locaux ou + "touristiques", branchés...). Un peu + eloigné de la citadelle mais ça se fait très bien a pied (30' env. en passant par des parcs sympas en bord de rivière), en taxi ou en scooter. 
Nous avons eu un surclassement sans rien demander dans une chambre avec un balcon avec une belle vue sur la rivière. Chambre spacieuse et confortable.
review.comment_negative: La piscine était très agréable avec les fortes chaleurs, il manque cependant peut être de quoi se poser au bord de la piscine, mais il n'y a pas forcément la place !

review.comment_positive:
L'atenció de la noia que porta l'hotel és espectacular. Una bellíssima persona.
L'habitació molt correcte i gran.
Hotel ben situat.

review.rating: The best place we stayed in Vietnam
review.comment_positive: Very central and quiet location in a side street. We had a very nice and big room with a balcony. They have a small swimming pool which you can use. Very warm and helpfull family. Excellent breakfast prepared by the mother. When you go to Hue, don't hesitate and take this homestay.
Wir waren rundum zufrieden und haben sogar ein kostenloses Upgrade für ein größeres Zimmer mit Balkon erhalten. Das Frühstück war toll und unbegrenzt. Wir kommen gerne wieder.

Sehr netter Empfang, Early-Check-In ohne Zusatzgebühren und ein zusätzliches kostenloses Frühstück, Personal hilfsbereit, informativ und jederzeit ansprechbar, kleine einfache familiäre Unterkunft, Frühstück á la Carte, frisch zubereitet

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Laura was an incredible host! We felt very welcomed from the very beginning and she did everything to meet our needs.
The bedroom had a great view and a comfortable bed!
We will come back

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Herausragend war die herzliche, familiäre Art der Gastgeberin und ihre Hilfsbereitschaft.
Das Zimmer ist gut und ruhig gelegen und hat ein sehr gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis und ist somit absolut zu empfehlen.
review.comment_negative: Für uns war das Bett ungewohnt hart.

review.rating: A homely hotel in an ideal location!
review.comment_positive: From the moment we walked in we knew we were in safe hands. We arrived at around 10pm and the owners were awake waiting for us. The hotel is in the perfect location, right near the walking street but far enough back so you don’t hear all the noise! Very laidback vibe and very easy to rent a scooter too.
review.comment_negative: The bed we had was very firm. I’m unsure if this is the case throughout however we both prefer softer beds.

review.comment_positive: Very helpful staff

Best hotel we stayed at in Vietnam! The value for money is amazing! Laura is the best host one could wish for as she is very attentive and caring and helps you with whatever you need. She is so lovely! The room was as pictured, very clean and spacious. We have to pay extra compliments to the amazing breakfast!

What a beautiful stay and sweet owners! We arrived really early after a night bus and she was too kind to give us an upgraded room and an early check in. One of the comfiest beds we had in Vietnam! 
MUST STAY while in Hue, next to the river, close to local food and hosted by a welcoming and genuine sweet family.
The staff in the hotel was amazing. Laura, the atendent  was very thoughful and did everything to make us fell at home.

Établissement très bien situé dans une rue discrète à l' arrière des rues animées. Tout peut se faire à pieds pour ce qui concerne HUE. Pour aller plus loin dans les alentours, et notamment les villages pour voir les chapeaux, l'encens, les fleurs en papier, vous pourrez louer un scooter ici directement à très bon prix. Pour rejoindre l' aéroport, idem, on vous gère un taxi et tout est à bon prix.
L'affaire est très bien gérée en famille. Le petit déjeuner est très bon, copieux. Check in et out facilité au niveau des horaires.
