review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect, the family that was very welcoming us, advising us and inviting us for taking times with them. The bedrooms perfect. Good location to visit the city, close to good restaurants. Breakfast was good.

review.rating: Perfecta ubicación y relación calidad precio
review.comment_positive: La habitación era grande y luminosa con ventanales enormes. Estaba muy limpio. El personal, en concreto la manager, era encantadora y siempre dispuesta a ayudar.
review.comment_negative: Quizá el desayuno es algo escaso. La entrada del hotel da una sensación un poco cutre, aunque cuando llegas a la habitación la sensación es todo lo contrario.

review.comment_positive: Tout était parfait, mais nous avons surtout apprécié la gentillesse de l’hôte qui a été aux petits soins avec nous, la chambre était grande et possédait une jolie vue!

review.rating: Perfect option to stay in Hue
review.comment_positive: Staff are really nice

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Laura e’ stata gentilissima!

TODO
Sobre todo que te hacen sentir como en casa, la cama super comoda, el desayuno buenisimo, ofrecen muchos servicios y siempre pendientes de nuestras necesidades. 

Además la habitación es muy amplia y la limpieza muy bien cosa que en Vietnam no suele pasar.

We were greeted with fresh mango juice and mango pieces, it was the nicest welcome in our 3 weeks in Vietnam, staff super friendly, made us bha mí for our early flight to Hanoi, would recommend the four seasons for your stay in Hue.

review.rating: Très bonne adresse à Huế que nous recommandons
review.comment_positive:
Très bon emplacement, chambre très claire et confortable, petit balcon agréable.
Toute la famille est très sympathique, souriante et efficace.
Petite rue dans quartier animé, facile de trouver un resto ou un café.

La piscina fue todo un plus. El agua está limpia y fresca, por lo que con el calor fue todo un acierto coger este alojamiento.

La habitación era muy amplia y el baño es nuevo. Disponen de frigorífico. 

El desayuno es a elección: un plato ( tortilla, tortitas huevos...) + 1 bebida(café, te, smothie) 

Está la posibilidad de rentar moto con ellos a un precio de 150k.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: So glad we booked the Four Seasons Hotel. Our hosts were the best and couldn't do enough for us.....from the welcome fruit platter and drink to the free breakfast the following morning. There's a swimming pool at the rear of the property and although it's not massive it's just what you need to cool off after a hot day exploring Hue.
review.comment_negative: There was nothing not to like......the only thing I didn't like was my decision not to stay in Hue and at the four seasons longer

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Buena ubicación. Habitación limpia y amplia. Laura muy simpática. Desayuno muy rico.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Une belle addresse! L'accueil de Laura est sympathise et facilitateur pour tout organiser!

review.comment_negative: The owners could not been any more helpful!

review.comment_positive: The rooms are really spacious and with a beautiful view. We got a free upgrade. Everyone is super friendly and helpful. We felt really welcomed and like home 😍
Phòng sạch sẽ, view đẹp, thoáng mát. Chị chủ rất nhiệt tình

Nous sommes arrivés extrêmement tôt le matin car nous avions un bus de nuit et nous avons eu la chambre disponible immédiatement alors que nous devions l’avoir à partir de 13 heures.
Accueil parfait et extrêmement gentil .
Nous avons été touché par cette personne.
Elle propose également des excursions à la journée pour peu d’argent .
Je recommande largement cet hôtel .
Hele aardige mensen, mooie ruime schone kamer, lekker ontbijtje en erg behulpzaam. En ook nog een openingsdrankje :)

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Wir wurden herzlich von Laura und ihrer Familie empfangen und haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen. Für uns Spätaufsteher war es hervorragend, da es den ganzen Tag über Frühstück gibt und so viel wie man möchte. (Ohne Aufpreis)
Die Zimmer sind sauber und wie auf den Bildern. Die Umgebung ist ruhig aber zentral und der Balkon schön begrünt. Die Familie war sehr hilfsbereit und hat uns jeden Wunsch von den Augen abgelesen.

Sehr nettes kleines und ruhiges privat geführtes Hotel in einer kleinen Seitenstraße ganz in der Nähe der Altstadt! Motorradverleih direkt im Hotel zu fairen Preisen! Die Gastgeber waren sehr nett und hilfreich! Wir wurden sogar spontan mit zu ihrer privaten Geburtstagsfeier eingeladen und auch sonst war alles da sehr familiär! Vielen Dank für den schönen Aufenthalt!

review.rating: The lady boss is kind and friendly, and the hotel offers great value for money.
review.comment_positive: While you wait to check in, they give you mango juice (actual pure mango juice) and mangoes. The rooms have floor-to-ceiling windows and a balcony, which make them really bright.
review.comment_negative: One common issue with hotels in the Hue area is that the hot water gets cooler the longer you shower.

review.comment_positive:
Pasamos solo una noche allí. Al llegar ( de un trayecto en bus nocturno) nos dieron fruta y nos preguntaron si nos apetecía desayunar. 
Toda la familia que lleva el hotel son muy amables, incluso nos fueron a comprar los billetes de tren hasta Da Nang y salieron por la mitad que si los hubiésemos comprado por 12go.asia. 
Como teníamos que coger el tren al día muy pronto se despertaron antes para hacernos el desayuno. 
La habitación estaba muy bien, con un gran ventanal donde podíamos ver la ciudad. las camas eran muy cómodas. la habitación tenía calefacción/ aire acondicionado que funcionaban perfectamente, secador, champú, cepillos de dientes…
Nos gustó todo. Sobretodo la amabilidad de los dueños. Las habitaciones muy limpias. Todo perfecto. Lo recomendamos para hospedaros en Hue. Ha sido perfecto!

Thank you to Laura and Michael for a memorable stay in Hue.

I had taken an overnight train from Ninh Binh and arrived at the hotel around 10:30am. Michael greeted me with some fruit and a mango smoothie which was much appreciated after my long journey. They even allowed me to check in early into my room which was really nice. The room itself was spacious, comfortable and well situated to Walking street where there are many restaurants and cafes.

Breakfast was included and you could choose between eggs, fresh bread and even pancakes. This was made fresh by Laura and it was a wonderful way to start the day ! 

I would definitely stay here again if I were ever to come to Hue and I would recommend it if you are searching for accomodation in Hue :)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Stanza molto grande e staff super amichevole, molto attento alle esigenze del cliente. Grazie mille Laura

review.rating: ห้องพักวิวดีเงียบสงบ
review.comment_positive: ห้องพักเงียบสงบ วิวดี เตียงนอนนุ่ม แอร์เย็น
review.comment_negative: ทีวีใช้งานไม่ได้

review.rating: Fabulous location ( down little alley). Clean, comfortable and very friendly. Perfect for our families stay
review.comment_positive: Location, clean, friendly people running it

review.rating: Zentrale schöne Unterkunft mit herzlicher Gastfreundlichkeit
review.comment_positive:
Lage sehr zentral in der kleinen Seitengasse, in die man zu Fuß laufen muss. Dadurch aber unglaublich ruhig. Tolle Aussicht aus den bodentiefen Fenstern. 
Wir erhielten einen kostenlosen Kaffee zur Begrüßung. Das kleine Hotel wird mit großer Hingabe von einer Familie betrieben. Unglaublich gastfreundlich, ohne aufdringlich zu sein.
Fahrstuhl vorhanden.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
El atendimiento de la dueña, muy simpática y amable. 
La cama era cómoda y la ubicación es buena. 
Para el desayuno, te da a elegir un plato y una bebida. No es buffet,  es sencillo pero suficiente.
review.comment_negative: Había una obra justo detrás que nos despertó muy temprano. Sobre las 5.30/ 6 am comienzan a trabajar y desde entonces es imposible dormir.

review.rating: Se sentir comme à la maison au milieu d’un voyage
review.comment_positive: La gentillesse de la propriétaire, l’accueil chaleureux, la localisation parfaite avec hôtel dans une impasse très calme, très bon petit déjeuner, chambre spacieuse propre et bien équipée, douche au top !

The room was very nice, comfortable beds and clean! 

The owners are verry friendly, sit down to welcome you and really want to help you to get the best experience! 

We loved our stay, thanks for taking such a good care of us!

La anfitriona es una persona encantadora. Nos ayudó y aconsejó en todo.
El último día hubo unas lluvias que lo inundaron todo y nos consiguió una barca para salir. Espero que se encuentren bien.
review.comment_negative: El aire de la habitación no funcionaba.

review.comment_positive: After a pleasant welcome of juice and fresh fruit, we were also given a room upgrade. The location is very close to the tourist area and walking streets but set far enough away to be quiet. The room and facilities provided everything we needed, especially appreciating the AC as temperatures reached 40 degrees. A breakfast choice each morning and fresh water provision all assisted in providing a great stay with a fabulous hostess.
Very helpful owner and the room was great and excellent value for money. The breakfast was simple but heathy and delicious.
very clean room and staff was very helpful and super nice! love the host!
chổ nghỉ sạch, chị chủ dể thương
Alles tipptopp! Melone, Mango und Wassermelonensaft als Willkommens-Aufmerksamkeit, familiär. Man fühlt sich immer willkommen.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The pool was small but better than the pictures. Given the extreme heat (June), it was a bonus. The bathroom was a good size and well laid out.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Great value for the price! Big, clean room, and central location. Laura was very friendly and helpful, and gave me the best restaurant recommendations.

La vraie gentillesse. 
Petit déjeuner excellent et à volonté. Même offert lors de notre arrivée très tôt. 
Un repas typique offert.
De tous nos hôtes : les premiers à nous donner 1 plan de ville et explications quand aux lieux d  intérêt.
Le calme et des nuits paisibles
Vos efforts en anglais.
Bien que fort critique je vous conseille cet hôtel à 200%. Merci L'aura et Michael.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: La proprietaria super gentile, bella stanza buona posizione

Netter Service. Toller Ausblick aus dem Zimmer! 30
Minuten von der Ancient City.
mình dùng dùng 1 bữa sáng thui. bữa sáng ổn với bánh mì+trứng ốp la/ốp lết.

Unglaublich freundliches Personal. Von Minute 1 beim Check-In mit Früchten und Fruchtsäften begrüßt, über Tipps und Empfehlungen für Touren und Ausflüge bis hin zu mehrmaligem, aber stets freundlichen Versicheren, dass der Aufenthalt alle Wünsche erfüllt. Die Lage ist gut, die Zimmer sehr sauber, das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis stimmt.
Wir kommen gerne wieder.
review.comment_negative: Der Pool ist wenig einladend. Liegemöglichkeiten gibt es wegen Platzmangels nicht.  Für eine kurze Abkühlung reicht es vollkommen. Sollte man als nice-to-have wahrnehmen. Wer stundenlang am Pool ausruhen will, wird hier enttäuscht sein.

review.comment_positive: Extremely nice and helpful owners. We appreciate the help with booking our following trip via motorbike and the lovely conversations. Thank you for a great stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Laura  und Michael sind herzliche,hilfsbereite und großzügige Gastgeber.. jeder Wunsch wurde erfüllt..super Matratze und Zimmer und Balkon nach hinten gelegen waren ruhig und mit Blick auf Fluss gelegen..
住宿地點靠近步行區、錢江橋。老闆和老闆娘很熱情，房間內有缺少東西或是需要幫忙的地方，都會提供協助或旅遊的建議。出租的摩托車很新、車子狀況很好。
review.comment_negative: 床單和冷氣感覺略微潮濕。

review.comment_positive: The hotel is great! Amazing room, great location and the host is incredibly sweet! They gave us fruits and water during our stay and we also rented a great motorbike from them. They also helped with planning our days by showing us the different attractions and markets.
Hoàn hảo, phòng sạch sẽ, có view đẹp, đủ tiện nghi. Đồ ăn sáng ngon và chị chủ siêu dễ thương. Lần sau đi Huế sẽ lại ở đây 🥰🥰
The host was extremely accommodating and attentive and kind. The room was clean, great location and great breakfast. The lift was very useful. Would recommend.

review.rating: Lovely stay at the four seasons hotel!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We had a lovely stay in the Hue Four seasons hotel. The rooms were super light, with big windows and a small balcony. The beds were very comfortable and the area was calm and we could relax.
When we woke up very late, Laura prepared us a delicious breakfast.
She also organized us drivers to the water park and then direction south to Hoi An.
Thank you!

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Personnel sympathique et serviable.
Chambre propre et plutôt bien équipée 
Piscine agréable.
Dans un quartier animé  mais au calme.

Unglaublich liebes und hilfsbereites Personal! Laura kümmert sich um alles :) Super sauberes Zimmer und leckeres Frühstück mit frischem Obst, Pancakes und vieles mehr. Wir waren während einer Überschwemmung dort und Laura hat sich sehr fürsorglich um uns gekümmert.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tout

Really cute modern hotel, with an amazing spacious clean bathroom and comfortable bed! The staff were really kind and friendly, letting us check-in early and check out late, and she was very accomodating to our needs. The location is good, there's a lot of cute coffeeshops and good food nearby. we were also near a market that sold a lot of fresh fruits. They also had a lot of new motorcycles/scooters for rent. We rented bicycles from a nearby shop. I'm so glad we were at this part of the city, pick up and drop off from the bus/van locations were convenient. Aircon worked well and bed was very comfortable. There were also big gorgeous windows and two light colors, bright white and cozy off-white. Totally recommend for budget travellers looking for clean and modern accomodation!
review.comment_negative: There was no breakfast available, prolly cause they were understaffed from COVID.

review.comment_positive: Lovely staff, great location, everything really make it a nice stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: El alojamiento es muy cómodo y está muy bien situado. La familia es muy acogedora y te ayudan en todo lo que necesites. Las habitaciones son espaciosas y las camas son cómodas

La amabilidad de la familia que lo lleva.
La piscina para refrescarte.
El desayuno está muy bien.
Y las motos de alquiler las mejores que cogimos en todo vietnam

review.rating: Super good hotel, felt like home with a hotel room. And the hostess are amazing.
review.comment_positive:
Everything !
The stay was so good. 
Everything is really nice. The room with the balcony, the shower, the bed. Even the lights were lovely. 
Breakfast was also good and had options. 
The best part in this hotel are the hostess! They made me feel on a1 day stay at home. They were so nice, kind and helpful. I would come back here !

Staff were so  friendly and accommodating, i was given a free breakfast as I arrived early morning. Breakfast was very tasty, bathroom had a  modern walk in shower and the room was very bright with a lovely little balcony. The Aircon worked well and was quiet. Lovely stay.

We really enjoyed our stay. We liked the location of the hotel, you just need 5 minutes to the city with lots of restaurants and bars. Our room was clean and had everything we needed. The breakfast was good and you could choose between different meals and get more after request. We were able to rent a scooter for one day and everybody was very helpful. We really liked the balcony!

Ruhige aber super zentrale Lage.
Sehr nette Vermieter.
Preis/Leistung allerbest.
review.comment_negative:
Betten sehr hart.
Etwas schwer zu finden.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Laura is een zeer vriendelijke en behulpzame host
Met veel reistips
Ze regelde fantastische easyriders voor ons naar Hoi An
Een fijn adres

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: Un'atmosfera di amore si respira nell'hotel

review.rating: Clean, friendly hotel for a stress-free stay at a great price
review.comment_positive: Friendly staff, easy scooter hire, clean & spacious rooms, great location
review.comment_negative: Nothing everything was great - great value for money

review.comment_positive: .Fantastic accommodation in Hue for a good price. The host family is extremely kind and helpful. Scooter rental available. Great location in town. The breakfast is tasty. The rooms and facilities are very clean. Highly recommend staying here.

Great location, near to lots of restaurants and bars but not noisy. Breakfast was essentially eggs any way you wanted them (including delicious pancakes) or soup with juice, fruit and coffee. The staff are very friendly and helpful.
review.comment_negative: The rooms are small but more than adequate for a few days stay. Otherwise nothing to fault.

review.comment_positive: Mình chọn ở đây là lần thứ 2 rồi, không có gì để chê cả. Anh chị chủ nhiệt tình, nice lắm ạ. Phòng sạch sẽ thoáng mát.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
La maitresse de maison qui nous a accueilli juste un ange😊❤️ tellement gentille 🙏👍😇

L'emplacement, la chambre, pouvoir arriver tot apres un trajet de nuit

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive:
Grande chambre lumineuse et propre. Très bien agencée et décorée. 
La gentillesse de la gérante.
Hôtel proche du centre mais situé au fond d'une ruelle, à l'abri de l'agitation.
review.comment_negative: Le matelas était peut être un peu vieux et déformé.

review.comment_positive:
Ci hanno accolto come una famiglia, sono stati 5 giorni fantastici! ogni mattina avevamo la colazione alla carta, la stanza era bellissima, con una gigantesca vetrata dove poter ammirare il tramonto e godersi la vista della città e del fiume. Svegliarsi con quella vista faceva la differenza. E la famiglia che lo gestisce è fantastica e sono molto disponibili, per qualsiasi aiuto puoi contare su di loro. 
Super approvato, speriamo tanto di tornarci!

All the staff members, owners and family were so kind with us. They made us a free upgrade to a familiar room with views. They also help us a lot with the visit yo Hue and transportation. They also prepared for us great breakfast including coffe with fresh milk. They allowed to usé the shower and the swimming pool before leaving, even after checking out. Don't miss this place.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Excellent emplacement en ville avec de très bons restaurants autour, la chambre lumineuse (ce qui est rare au Vietnam), la gentillesse et les bons conseils de Laura, le petit déjeuner avec les fruits et les pancakes délicieux (appréciés après de nombreux petits dej vietnamiens)
review.comment_negative: On sent un peu les ressorts du matelas, c’est tout à fait supportable

review.comment_positive: Great location, good size room, Laura was very friendly and helpful
review.comment_negative: Whole bathroom flooded after a shower as the drain is at the wrong end of the room. Laundry was damp.

review.rating: Muy buena estancia en Hue Four Seasons
review.comment_positive: El personal del hotel genial, nos ayudaron en todo lo que necesitamos. Relación calidad- precio muy bien. El desayuno era correcto y la ubicación muy buena.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Frühes Einchecken, Begrüßungsgetränk
Sehr freundlicher und persönlicher Empfang

review.rating: great budget hotel run by lovely family
review.comment_positive: the couple running the hotel were genuinely friendly and lovely in a way one rarely experiences in hotels. pretty much everything worked and was sufficiently alright. so, considering the low price it gets a clear recommendation from me!
review.comment_negative: sinks need clearing. bed side lamps seem to not work (or i was just too stupid to figure out how/where to switch them on)

review.comment_positive: very nice place to stay. clean, great location.

review.rating: Genial Hotel para pasar un par de noches como en casa.
review.comment_positive:
Los gerentes son un encanto. Siempre dispuestos a ayudar y con una sonrisa en la boca.
Las habitaciones fantásticas relación calidad-precio.
Laura la gerente es una mujer con muchas ganas de hablar con los viajeros y te hace estar como en casa.
Tienen una pequeña piscina para refrescarte.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Wir hatten ein schönes, grosses Zimmer, das Personal war sehr freundlich und die Lage war ebenfalls sehr gut. Ich würde wieder hier übernachten.
Laura and her family were lovely. We felt right at home. The breakfast was also delicious! The shower was a good pressure and the Aircon worked perfectly which was needed in the hot weather.
review.comment_negative: A little noisy because of the central location.

review.rating: The place to stay when visiting Hue!!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Laura and her family were so kind and accommodating during our stay at the Four Seasons Hotel! Great location that’s close to the centre but down a quiet road. Great breakfast and comfortable room with amazing views!! Highly recommend this lovely hotel as the place to stay when visiting Hue!!
review.comment_negative: There was nothing we didn’t like, the two-night stay was wonderful!

review.comment_positive: Localização, limpeza, atendimento, tudo perfeito.
Nice view, nice location, the people were very friendly they received us with breakfast because we arrive earlier than the check in
La gentillesse du personnel

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Чисто, хороший вид и удобное расположение, дружелюбная хозяйка

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Extrem freundliches Personal, Laura und Michael waren sehr hilfsbereit bei allen Anliegen. Zwei sehr warmherzige Menschen. Es war wie ein Besuch bei guten Freunden.

review.rating: Laura made us feel very welcome. Even booked our bus for the onward trip.
review.comment_positive: Arrived very hot Laura gave us a refreshing drink and fresh fruit. Breakfast was great a good selection. Hotel is very central to everything in a quiet place.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Gentilezza e accoglienza, la colazione

Mi habitación era amplia, sencilla pero super confortable. Y además, con un pequeño balconcito. El baño amplio y con bastantes amenities. ¡Y tenía ascensor! (lo comento porque no en todos los hoteles similares en los que estuve en Vietnam tenían ascensor) :)
El desayuno, a la carta y preparado en el momento, estupendo. 
Está situado en un callejón, y estaba como medio en obras, así que un día que llovió estaba un poco impracticable. Pero no hay ningún problema porque no hay por qué entrar por el callejón. Es más cómodo atravesar un parking de motos que hay justo enfrente. Y lo bueno de estar en ese callejón es que no había ruidos de tráfico que sí habría en otras calles cercanas. 
Laura fue excepcional. Si pudiera ponerle un 20 en vez de un 10, se lo pondría. Solícita, colaborativa, un cielo de mujer. 
El día que llegué, como llegué muy temprano por la mañana y no tenía habitación libre todavía, me guardó las maletas hasta la hora del check in y me invitó a desayunar. No pude empezar mejor :) 
Y me ayudó también con una reserva de bus con la que no conseguía aclararme llamando un par de veces a la agencia de transporte. Lo dicho, un cielo! :)

review.rating: Een super lief gezin die alles voor je doet om je verblijf fijn te maken.
review.comment_positive: Een super lief gezin die zich in zet om je verblijf zo fijn mogelijk te maken. Het ontbijt was heerlijk en de kamer was schoon en ruim. Ondanks dat mijn vriend een beetje ziek was, hebben we het erg fijn bij Hue Four Seasons hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nous avons adoré notre séjour chez Laura et Tuan. Cela fait un mois et demi que nous voyageons, et c'est la première fois que nous sommes accueillis avec un sens de l'hospitalité aussi prononcé. Merci à tous les deux pour votre gentillesse et pour votre générosité. Nous ne vous oublierons pas et parlerons de vous autour de nous.

Staff were very friendly and welcoming. The welcome drink and fruit wàs just what i needed after a long day of travelling. They also gave me a map which highlighted places to visit and nice restaurants etc.
The room had everything that ì needed, and everything was within walking distance. 
I would definitely stay here again when I'm back in the area.

너무 친절한 사람들
나에게 집에 와있는 것같은 편안함을 주었습니다.
가성비도 완전 짱

The owners and the staffs are wonderful, helpful and very friendly. The place has a Japanese vibes with the decorations. The location is perfect, from the hotel you can walk to the riverside. Not too far from Imperial Palace.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Absolutamente todo genial. La familia súper amable y atenta. El desayuno buenísimo y hay muchas cosas para escoger. Te dan una muy buena bienvenida. Habitaciones impecables. Todos los días servicio de habitaciones que te cambian toallas, hacen las camas... Hay secador, nevera, tele, mampara en la ducha, jabones, cepillos de dientes .. muy buena situación!!! Mil gracias por todo

review.rating: Good location and a good stay
review.comment_positive: Well located, within a 10 minute walk of the river walk and a 30-35 minute walk of the imperial citadel. Close to good restaurants, including Nook Eatery. Free breakfast was convenient and you could order as much as you want. Two free small waters provided. Staff was nice. Room had a fridge and hot water kettle and was clean.
review.comment_negative: Free breakfast was a bit greasy and simple. I was brought to my room without an explanation of the city or local recommendations. I had to ask for them the next morning. The lighting was a bit harsh in the room, so I used my phone light at night. The toilet would leak water unless I closed the valve. No soap provided, only shampoo. I could hear traffic noises in my room (in case you are a sensitive sleeper). Just an FYI that not all rooms face the garden or river - mine faced the street.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: La gentillesse de Laura, l ambiance familiale, la propreté, la tranquillité au fond d une impasse

Je conseille vivement cet hotel bien situé dans le centre. Chambre propre et confortable. La propriétaire est charmante et attentionnée. Bon petit déjeuner et possibilité de louer des scooters pour pas grand chose. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez eux.

review.rating: Hard to imagine a better host and better value!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The host goes above and beyond to make you feel comfortable. She is super warm, accommodating and helpful. I had a great room with big windows and a view of the river. Excellent value!
review.comment_negative: Nothing major, the sink leaked a little bit and the shower drain was unusual but it didn’t affect me negatively.

review.rating: Anfitriona extraordinaria y muy buena ubicación
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: La amabilidad de la dueña, que te recibe con un refresco y algo de fruta. Nos dio un mapa y nos ayudó con información sobre la ciudad. El alojamiento está muy bien situado
review.comment_negative: El aire acondicionado no enfriaba bien la habitación y las camas no eran muy cómodas, se te clavaban los muelles. Por lo demás todo genial

review.comment_positive: Der Ausblick aus dem Zimmer war fantastisch! Die Gastgeberin super lieb und hat uns mit allem geholfen was wir brauchten. Wir können den Aufenthalt hier empfehlen.

Super nettes, kleines Familienhotel. 
Alles top, mega Preis-Leistungsverhältnis!
Das Bad ist recht neu renoviert, hat uns gut gefallen.
review.comment_negative: Die Duschköpfe/brause könnte mal wieder ausgetauscht werden.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive:
Nous avons adoré les deux nuits passées dans cet hôtel. L'accueil était très chaleureux : nous sommes arrivés tôt de Ninh Binh par le train de nuit et on nous a offert le petit déjeuner !
La chambre est très propre et confortable, l'hôtel étant dans une ruelle c'est très calme le soir.
Le petit déjeuner est à la carte (on peut faire plusieurs choix) et très bon (prenez des pancakes à la banane)! La famille qui gère cet hôtel est très sympa et nous nous y sommes sentis bien du début à la fin.
Près de tout mais dans une petite ruelle pour avoir du calme en soirée. Le personnel est extrêmement dévoué et souriant. On a adoré!

Générosité et gentillesse des propriétaires incroyable ! Très bon accueil !
Petit déjeuner au top ! 
Bon emplacement !

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Super accueil, petite piscine qui nous a fait plaisir vu la chaleur. A quelques pas des rues piétonnes avec les bars et restaurants. 20min a pieds de la cité impériale. La chambre était très propre et il y a une paroi de douche !

La ubicación era buena, la cama super cómoda, todo muy limpio, la propietaria muy encantadora, pedimos comida a domicilio y nos la subieron hasta el piso de la habitación.
Recomiendo a todo el mundo alojarse en el hotel. Desayuno muy rico.
great location, nice staff, good breakfast.

review.rating: Very nice and helpful, good value for money
Perfect place to stay in Hue !
review.comment_positive: Super accueil (nous sommes arrivés à 6h30 du matin et une chambre nous attendait ainsi que le petit déjeuner), grandes chambres très lumineuses et au calme, bonne literie, eau chaude avec douche séparée des WC, ascenseur. Super petit déjeuner! Merci pour le chauffeur pour aller ensuite à Hoi An, c’était parfait :) je recommande pour une ou deux nuits
review.comment_negative: En raison du mauvais temps, l’eau de la piscine avait tourné et était trop froide pour s’y baigner. Je ne recommande pas de venir pour la piscine, elle est trop petite et pas très engageante… Le fabuleux accueil de la famille compense largement, nous reviendrons !

review.comment_positive: Phòng xinh, có ban công, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Rất thoải mái. Chị chủ nhiệt tình dễ thương. Recommend mn đặt phòng ở đây nhé ạ.
Sin lugar a dudas lo mejor es la atención de la dueña.

review.rating: I really enjoyed my stay in Four Seasons. I would definitely recommend it to anyone going to Hue.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The homestay is located near the center of Hue but in an alley so it's mostly quiet at night. The hosts are very nice people and incredibly helpful and will answer any question. They really look after you like a family member. The room was spacious and bed comfortable. It is great value for money.
review.comment_negative: A dog barking and a rooster woke me up early in the morning.

review.comment_positive: El personal encantador, incluso nos invito a desayunar el día que llegamos y el siguiente día nos prepararon el desayuno muy pronto por la mañana.

Laura, l'hôtesse est exceptionnelle.  Elle fait tout ce qui est en son pouvoir pour que ces invités soient bien.
Le ghesthouse est à distance de marche de plusieurs restaurants et de la cité impériale.
review.comment_negative: Ceci n'est pas la faute de l'établissement mais un coq chante tous les matins à 4h.  Laura a même voulu l'acheter afin de régler la situation, ça vous donne une idée de sa bienveillance envers ces clients.

review.rating: Joli hôtel familial, idéalement situé pour découvrir Hué
review.comment_positive: Absolument tout! La gentillesse de l’hôte, la propreté de la chambre, la situation géographique, la vue de la chambre, le tout était parfait pour découvrir Hué! Je recommande à 100%

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công

review.comment_positive:
Prettige ontvangst met welkomstdrankje.
Ruime kamer met schone badkamer.
Het bed was hard. Ontbijt was uitgebreid en prima
Voor wat je betaald krijg je een fijne kamer.

Hospitable, family run small hotel. Clean & comfortable. Goodbreakfast. Small lift to upper floors if needed. Close to river, food stalls & restaurants but set back in an alley so it is quiet. The smallish but deep pool is wonderful after a hot day out. Hire a bicycle, cross the bridge & ride in the park beside the river to the citadel & pagoda.

review.rating: Goed hotel dichtbij de leuke straatjes van Hue
review.comment_positive: Zeer behulpzame mensen, regelen van alles voor je, waaronder de DMZ tour. Bij aankomst vanuit de nachtbus naar Hoi An kregen we zelfs nog een ontbijt, omdat we nog niet ontbeten hadden. Kamer zijn groot en comfortabel. Douche was goed met warm water. Als pré een smart tv.
review.comment_negative: De bedden zijn vrij hard, wat eigenlijk overal in Vietnam de standaard is.

review.comment_positive: Such a lovely and clean place in the centre and close to all amenities and things to do. The family running it are the sweetest and kindest people we met im Vietnam, always with a smile and ready to hell with anything we needed. Room was super clean and quiet and the best thing is that you can have your  breakfast any time you want with no limitations! Thank you Laura for being so kind and helpful, we will definitely come back!

review.rating: We regret that we could not stay longer
review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Laura and her family are very nice, warm and helpful. They have maps ready for guests and lots of good advice and recommendations. We arrived early morning and got free breakfast - just beacause our room wasnt ready yet for early check-in

review.rating: Chuyến đi thú vị, phòng view đẹp, anh chị chủ nhiệt tình, dễ thương lắm! Nên đặt nha cả nhà!!

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: l’accueil chaleureux des propriétaires, l’emplacement de l’hôtel, le rapport qualité prix, la proximité des restaurants, l’aménagement de la chambre
review.comment_negative: la propreté laissait à désirer dans la chambre et sur les tables à déjeuner, la piscine était verte

review.comment_positive: Tụi mình đến sớm hơn giờ check in, nên được chị chủ đổi cả phòng cho sang phòng trống khác rộng hơn xíu để check in sớm, mà phòng cũng sạch sẽ đẹp nè, hơi sáng xíu hoy, còn anh chị chủ cũng siêu thân thiện đáng yêu ạ.
The staff were incredibly welcoming and accomodating. They gave us lots of local tips and recomendations and went out of their way to make us feel welcomed and at home.
Accueil chaleureux et très bon emplacement !

review.rating: Hôtel de très bon rapport qualité prix avec un personnel dévoué
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Chambre propre et lumineuse 
Personnel disponible et aimable 
Petite piscine appréciable pour se rafraîchir 
Bon emplacement

Bij het toekomen werden we hartelijk ontvangen. De eigenaars zijn heel vriendelijk, helpen bij alles, niets is teveel gevraagd. Het ontbijt was basic maar goed. Meerdere keuzes mogelijk. De kamer was groot en de douche heerlijk. Het hotel is gelegen in een rustig doodlopend straatje in het centrum.
review.comment_negative: Door de vele regen was de kamer soms vochtig. Dit kon opgelost worden door de ramen open te zetten.

review.rating: Lugar agradable y tranquilo. Trato estupendo
review.comment_positive: Atención muy buena de toda la familia. Habitación limpia y tranquila. Nos ayudaron y dieron indicaciones para visitar la ciudad. Desayuno muy rico. Repetiriamos
Nhà mình đã có 1 đêm rất hài lòng ở đây! Yên tĩnh, sạch sẽ và rất nhiệt tình!

Everything is good. Location is good, room nice and clean and very spacious. Bathroom very clean. Beds very comfortable, balcony is nice. 

Thanks to Tang and her family for helping me during my stay!

review.rating: Des hôtes très gentils et chaleureux
review.comment_positive:
L’accueil à immédiatement était très chaleureux de la part de Laura et sa famille ! 
Ils nous ont laissé la chambre plus tôt que prévu. La chambre était lumineuse et confortable. 
Le petit-déjeuner était très bien également. 
Nous avons passé un bon séjour en partie grâce au Four seasons Hôtel !
We really enjoyed they hostitality! There are such a kind of people there.
review.comment_negative: unfortunately the room was pretty dirty.the swimming pool is not in a useable condition

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: amazing value with kind owners, lovely views and breakfast
review.comment_positive:
this hotel is amazing value - the rooms on the higher floors have massive windows with a lovely view of the palm trees and the river. the family who run the place are absolutely lovely - they cook amazing breakfasts with whatever you want (omelette AND pancakes 😀) and are so helpful. when I had to take my boyfriend to the hospital, the owner offered to come along and help 😀 the bed is comfy and the room is well equipped with TV, kettle, toothbrush, soap… and comfy beds. showers are nice and hot and the location is nice with the backpacker street a five minute walk away and the imperial city about 20 min walk

there is also a really nice cafe on the river at the end of the street ☺️

Superbe accueil, gentillesse de l'hôte.
Hôte très disponible, prêt à vous aider. 
Elle nous a même proposé de prendre une douche une fois la chambre libérée vu que notre train était le soir. 
Bon petit déjeuner, super emplacement au calme dans une impasse.
Insonorisation moyenne.
La amabilidad del personal y la ayuda que nos ofrecieron para visitar la ciudad
Die Unterkunft ist zentral gelegen, dennoch abseits des Stadttrubels. Sehr freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal. Laura war immer daran gelegen, dass es einem gut geht. Einfach zu Empfehlen
Host en personeel waren super vriendelijk en behulpzaam.

Our family stayed 4 nights and had a wonderful experience. The hosts were extremely friendly and super helpful with suggestions and bookings. Thank you! The rooms were clean, comfortable and spacious. The location is near many shops and restaurants, yet is very quiet. Would highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: 我们坐夜大巴到顺化，早晨很早到的酒店，女主人很热情，为我们做了早餐，并且让我们提前入住。后来又带我们去租自行车，帮我们打了折扣。我们后面的行程也都是在她这里包的车，价格合理。第二天一早，我们很早出发去会安，她又给我们提前打包了早餐，而且没额外收费。她家离夜大巴下车地点也很近，走几分钟就到。

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Location
Breakfast was nice. Staff was very friendly.
review.comment_negative: The room felt a bit damp due to high humidity of the air.

review.comment_positive: Nos equivocamos con las fechas del viaje y no nos pusieron ningún problema para cambiárnosla. Además, nos guardaron las maletas todo el día y nos dejaron ducharnos antes de irnos aunque ya habíamos hecho el check out, un detalle muy importante con el calor y la humedad que hay en la zona. Muy amables y serviciales. Atentos en todo momento, pero sin agobiar. Tiene un precio muy bueno en relación a la calidad que ofrece.
review.comment_negative: Poco gel y la cama un poco dura, por decir algo. Pero seguro que si hubiésemos pedido más nos lo habrían dado.

review.comment_positive:
Accueil extrêmement gentil
Matelas confortable 
Salle de bains fonctionnelle 
Laura nous a préparé notre bon petit-déjeuner à 6 heures ! Merci Laura pour ta gentillesse et toutes tes petites attentions ...

review.rating: Homestay  familial et un personnel tres attentionné.  A recommander
review.comment_positive: La disponibilité et le sourire du petsonnel qui fait tout pour vous faciliter le séjour. Hébergement très bien situé

review.rating: Un hotel con encanto con un precio muy atractivo
review.comment_positive: La amabilidad del personal, la limpieza, la ubicación y, sobre todo,  el precio

review.rating: amazing, accommodating, welcoming and so lovely.
review.comment_positive: A beautiful little property close to the bustling streets with restaurants and bars (5/10 minute walk) - you get the best of both worlds with the property being slightly off the Main Street so it’s quiet too. The rooms are immaculate, modern, sparkling clean with lift too!! And the family who run this hotel are the loveliest people and cannot do enough for you. We arrived before check in after the night bus and Laura made us breakfast which she did not charge us for - she offered if any room came free before check out she would have it made up for us. I cannot recommend staying here more. Such a lovely property run by such a lovely lovely family. I can’t praise it enough!!

review.rating: Hôtel très agréable pour deux nuits à Hué
review.comment_positive:
- L’accueil +++ : Nous avons eu plusieurs hôte très sympathiques en guesthouse au Vietnam, mais Laura est clairement au-dessus: très chaleureuse, elle s’est assurée que notre (court) séjour se passe au mieux et nous a aidé à organiser notre trajet pour Hoi An en nous mettant en contact avec un loueur de moto.
- la chambre standard bien que petite était lumineuse avec une grande baie vitrée 
- le petit déjeuner était bon avec possibilité de commander un deuxième plat
- bonne localisation
review.comment_negative: - La douche était un peu défectueuse mais ok

review.comment_positive:
The staff was so helpful, always with a smile and assisted us in everything we needed.
The view from the room was fantastic.
review.comment_negative: The air-conditioning system made the atmosphere in the room extremely dry.

review.comment_positive: El acceso dificultoso por obras se ve recompensado con creces por la amabilidad  y generosidad  de Laura y su familia siempre dispuesta a echar una mano con una sonrisa. La ubicación es tranquila y perfecta  para visitar el ambiente de noche y restaurantes. Para la ciudad imperial es fácil coger tuctuc o grab, incluso bici. Una mujer valiente y cariñosa!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: The host Trang (Laura) is super friendly and welcomed us with mango slices and juice. Check-in time was flexible. Our room was comfortable. Location of the hotel is good and the breakfast was delicious. Overall, we were very pleased.

Absolutely lovely and beautiful place! The family is very kind, my room was fantastic with panorama window and balcony with view over the river. Everything clean and nice, even the fan had a remote control🙏😊. Breakfast "any time you wake up" :).
Easy motorbike rental and a super sweet dog😄.
Would come back any time! Thank you!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: Personal war sehr zuvorkommend, hilfreich und freundlich. Die Unterkunft war beim ersten mal etwas schwierig zu finden, aber sobald man weiß, wo sie ist, oder man einen Vietnamesen fragt, um herauszufinden, wo das Hotel ist, ist die Lage perfekt und zentral. Ca. 30m Fußweg und man sitzt in einem Kaffee mit tollem Ausblick am Wasser
Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình, phòng nghỉ sạch sẽ, giá phòng hợp lý, vị trí thuận tiện đi đến các địa điểm tham quan, các nhà hàng ăn uống.
スタッフ全員がとても親切でした。
review.comment_negative: 机と椅子、ソファがあると良い

review.comment_positive: Laura is an amazing host and such a kind person. We were greeted with fruit and tea on arrival. The room was cosy and bright, and the property is perfectly located for access to the river and walking streets. The breakfast, which was cooked to order, was delicious and fresh. We will definitely stay here again if we return to Hue!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
I loved the location as it was central but it was down a quiet alley.  Laura and her family were so welcoming.  On arrival you first sit down and have a juice while she marks up a map showing you some great places to visit.  Her two restaurant recommendations were spot on.  

Plus the included breakfast was made when I wanted breakfast, not between a set time schedule.
review.comment_negative:
I booked because it had a swimming pool, which it did have tucked away at the back of the building however besides a hard marble bench, there was really nowhere to really sit, relax and read a book while I dried off. I did have a lovely small balcony but couldn't get from one to the other soaking wet.

The biggest negative (and Laura is aware of it and trying to rectify) was the neighbour's new rooster waking me up both mornings at 5am.

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn nằm trong khu yên tĩnh, gần trung tâm, chợ Đông Ba, giao thông thuận tiện; phòng ngủ có tầm nhìn thoáng và nhìn ra sông Hương êm đềm, sạch sẽ; chủ nhà thân thiện, chu đáo.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nice
clean,tidy, polite.

review.rating: Wonderful stay! Clean, quiet and cosy
review.comment_positive: Fantastic host, very helpful and informative. Received a welcome drink on arrival which we loved as we were soaking wet and cold. Room was clean, quiet and spacious. Lots of good restaurants, market and bars nearby, walking street very close too. Fantastic breakfast in the morning, were offered food repeatedly until full. Cleaned room after one night and gave clean towels without request and free of charge. Also allowed us late checkout without difficulty.  Absolutely loved this stay, very cosy and genuine feel

What stands out is the wonderfully friendly owner who treats every guest individually and is really well organised. She arranged two tours for me at reasonable prices and recommended restaurants in the area.
I arrived early in the morning and was offered free breakfast and after a short while I could check in my room although it was before check in time.
The room had big windows so there was lots of light inside which I appreciated a lot. Breakfasts were good, you could ask for extra portions.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Laura et sa famille sont d'une grande gentillesse, toujours disponibles pour quoi que ce soit, je recommande vivement !

review.rating: Agréablement surpris du début à la fin. Superbe !
review.comment_positive: We were warmly welcomed.  The staff is caring.  They were very flexible with renting the scooter.  The breakfast was very good and plentiful.  I highly recommend !

review.rating: Hotel raccomandato per posizione, rapporto qualità/prezzo e soprattutto per la gentilezza e disponibilità dello staf
review.comment_positive: La posizione, la gentilezza dello staff (in particolare di Laura), la colazione.
Great accommodation really worth the money for the price. The host was very nice and we also had the possibility to check in early without any extra charges.

review.rating: A lovely stay in a cosy family-run hotel
review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
This is a family-run hotel and Laura and Michael and their family are excellent - helpful and sincere. The children are lovely too when they are around (they are at school most of the time). 

They put us on a high floor for the views, and there's a lift so going up and down wasn't a problem. 

Location is excellent - lots of great food options around - just Google. 

We stayed two nights here and would have stayed more if we had had the time.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Établissement bien situé avec un personnel très sympathique.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Honestly in a dead end road, so very quite yet close to the busy nightlife area. Owner Laura very helpful in everything one needs. Rooms small, simple and functional, balconies in some rooms are appreciated. Highly recommended.thanks, Laura.
review.comment_negative: Aircon a bit weak, but together with an additional ventilator more than sufficient.

review.comment_positive: Good rooms with balcony, quiet, comfy bed and clean. The location is not too far to the citadel. The owner of the hotel are very pleasant and friendly and help you where they can. Breakfast is simple but lovely.

review.rating: Very nice to stay at Four season. Thank you Laura!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Perfect location, in the center, but in an alley so very quiet at night. We got breakfast on the house when we arrived at 09:00 (nightbus from Hanoi). We also got early checkin. Laura and her family was very nice. They helped us to carry our luggage to the room and the taxi. She arranged private taxi from Hue to Da nang (1350 000 VND). Got bottles of water when we came and when we left. Our youngest son liked the pool.  Nice view from the bed.
review.comment_negative: Aircondition needed a service (low cooling effect). The key was a bit hard to get in the door. Just need some oil.
The bed was a little noisy.

review.rating: Je relogerai dans cet hôtel quand je reviendrai à Hué
review.comment_positive: L’accueil, la situation, tout !
El desayuno estaba delicioso. La habitación y baño limpios. Laura fue muy amable
review.comment_negative: El colchon era incomodo, estaba muy duro y viejo.

review.comment_positive:
Eine super Unterkunft mit einem ausgezeichnetem Preis Leistungs Verhältnis!! 
Das Personal war super freundlich und sehr zuvorkommend. 
Das Frühstück war im Preis inklusive und jederzeit verfügbar, außerdem konnte man soviel bestellen wie man wollte, klasse!!

An unforgettable experience at this charming guest house in Hue, Vietnam. The warmth of the host family added a special touch to my stay. The room was clean and comfortable, providing a cozy atmosphere. The breakfast prepared by the family was delicious, and their hospitality made my trip even more memorable. Thank you for this authentic immersion into Vietnamese culture!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The host Laura was always available to arrange everything.

review.rating:
Fijn,goed gelegen hotelletje  met heel vriendelijke mensen die het runnen

A
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Vriendelijk onthaal met veel info over de bezienswaardigheden
Veel ontbijtkeuze
Laura is een heel aangename gastvrouw,zij regelde een goedkope taxi voor ons
Hotel ligt vlak bij het centrum en is toch niet lawaaierig

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nous avons passé une nuit dans cet hôtel et avons été très bien accueillis par Laura et sa famille, nous avons même été surclassés sans supplément. La chambre était très grande, lumineuse, avec un balcon et une très grande fenêtre. Petit déjeuner très bon, avec du choix.
Great little place run by a lovely family. Laura is such a kind and helpfull person. Clean, bright ,good size room in great location; and value for money is exceptional.

review.comment_negative:
Khách sạn huỷ phòng khi đã gần đến ngày check in , mình đã đặt phòng trước đó nửa tháng , vào dịp lễ 2/9 k thể nào tìm ra phòng để đặt 
Mình chưa đến chỗ nghỉ nên k đánh giá về chất lượng phòng hay gì , chỉ đánh giá về cách làm việc của khách sạn thiếu chuyên nghiệp

review.comment_positive: Laura is a very friendly and helpful host. The room was perfect. The breakfast was also really good. I recommend it 100%

Niesamowita gościnność właścicieli (jest to bardziej homestay niż hotel), po nocnym autobusie przyjechaliśmy do hotelu z samego rana I zostaliśmy niezwykle miło powitani i zaseriwano nam śniadanie bez dodatkowych opłat... pokoj otrzymaliśmy już o 10 i to lepszy niż ten który zarezerowalismy. Widać że właścicielce bardzo zależy ba tym miejscu i goszczeniu ludzi - nie jest to wymuszone tylko autentycznie ona to lubi i sprawia jej radość. Pomogła nam też z biletami na pociąg. W pokoju było wygodne łóżko, mydlo, szampon, suszarka do włosów, czajnik i duże okno z widokiem na zieleń- bardzo miło było się obudzić z takim widokiem

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: 스텝들은 친절했고 가격대비 룸 상태도 좋았음

review.rating: Buen sitio donde dormir en Hue.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Buena relación calidad-precio en el centro de Hue. El personal maravilloso, nos ayudaron en todo y fueron muy amables. Hizo mucha calor los días que estuvimos y la piscina era de agradecer.

Lovely host and great location. Typhoon hit Hoi An while we were in Hue and we were confined to our room for 16 hours and the host made us breakfast despite it not being included in our stay. Very kind of them.
It is a very nice place, a bit hidden. I had a room with a few :-). The staff was very helpful and kind by helping me with everything. I would recommended it everytime.

review.rating: perfect and unbelievable value for money
review.comment_positive:
great location
very clean and comfortable
great breakfast
family who run the hotel are extremely helpful and friendly

Ubicacion del hotel, al lado del centro y la ciudadela pero en una calle tranquila sin trafico.
Baño muy limpio y nuevo
Buena relacion calidad precio
Ofrecen posibilidad de alquilar moto

Laura was a wonderful host and made us feel very welcome. Her whole family were very helpful in making our short trip to Hue very special! She provided us with loads of great advice about the area and onward travel. The breakfast menu was great and the banana pancakes were delicious! The room was clean and comfortable, and the TV had a lot of great channels to watch movies. The bathroom was modern. The location was good - near to the party streets (if that's your thing) but tucked away in a nice little back street for peace & quiet.

review.rating: Kleines freundliches Hotel für kurze Aufenthalte super geeignet.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Das Personal war super freundlich. Laura und ihre Familie waren wirklich top und haben auf unsere Wünsche super reagiert. Das Frühstück war lecker und die Lage war auch gut. Das Hotel ist in einer Gasse versteckt, somit ruhig und vom Straßenlärm weg. 
Man sollte keinen Luxus erwarten, aber dafür ist der Preis einfach sehr sehr fair. Uns hat es für zwei Nächte völlig gereicht und wir würden wiederkommen.
review.comment_negative: Könnte evtl. mal einen neuen Anstrich gebrauchen, aber nichts wildes.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Es war perfekt
Servicio excelente. Todo muy limpio y excelente ubicación.

review.rating: Semplice, comodo e ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo
review.comment_positive: Posizione e ambiente familiare super gentile

Super séjour , merci à Laura pour sa gentillesse et son accueil. 
Chambre très propre, bon petit déjeuner et bon emplacement.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The owner is very friendly. The hotel will do if you plan to stay for a night or two and you don't expect too much.
review.comment_negative: The pool was a disappointment: it was very small and there was no space to sit around it. They don't automatically clean room or change towels every day.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The hotel is well positioned and the staff especially Laura are just lovely. The breakfast was great and you could order more if you wanted.
review.comment_negative: The mattresses in our room needed upgrading

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
El hotel está perfectamente ubicado, cerca de la zona comercial. La habitación tiene una pequeña terracita con vistas al río Perfume. 
El personal del hotel es una familia muy agradable siempre atentos. Te reciben con fruta y un zumo y una sonrisa. Laura nos ayudó con los traslados para visitar las tumbas de los emperadores y el transfer a Hoi An

review.rating: 따뜻한 사람들과. 후에의 정취가 느껴지는 뷰.
review.comment_positive: 친철한 직원 분과 객실에서 보이는 뷰와 침구류 및 청결상태가 최고입니다.

review.rating: Entre l'accueil, le service, les petits déjeuners le confort/propreté des lieux, tout à été parfait!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
En tout premier lieu l'accueil et le service ! Les petits déjeuner copieux variés ( du p'tit déjeuner vietnamien en passant par le salé outre atlantique et baguette beurre confiture.) , boissons au choix et toujours cette esquise assiette de fruits frais.
La chambre trés confortable (literie au top) et une propreté nickel !

Great value for money! The owners were very friendly and accomodating, allowing us early check-in for free, giving us lychees, sorting out our taxi, doing our laundry within 5 hours. The room had a lovely window, was large and spotless. Would really recommend.
Chambre très bien, tout le monde était extrêmement sympathique.
Habitacion amplia y limpia. A pesar se estar muy bien situado, no era una zona ruidosa. Los dueños del hotel fueron muy amables

review.rating: Familiäre Atmosphäre mit gutem Frühstück und toller Gastgeberin
review.comment_positive:
Unser Aufenthalt im März 2023 für zwei Nächte war wirklich toll. Bei der Ankunft wurden wir sehr nett begrüßt und in die Sehenswürdigkeiten der Stadt eingeführt. Das Frühstück war gut, die Familie ist sehr bemüht und alle unsere Fragen wurden beantwortet. Der Wäscheservice war günstig und schnell.
Die Lage der Unterkunft ist super, es ist ruhig und zentral, sodass alles schnell fußläufig erreichbar ist. Lediglich für den Weg vom Bahnhof zur Unterkunft brauchten wir zu Fuß länger als gedacht, aber das war unsere Fehlplanung :) Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis ist unschlagbar.
review.comment_negative: Insgesamt empfanden wir das Zimmer trotz des guten Preis-Leistungsverhältnisses - und deshalb ist das hier wirklich jammern auf hohem Niveau - etwas verbesserungswürdig. Die Klimaanlage hat zwar funktioniert, wurde aber durch einen Papierschnipsel offengehalten und wirkte wartungsbedürftig. Im Badezimmer, welches sehr ordentlich ist, sollte dringend eine Lüftung installiert werden, da es keine Fenster gibt.

review.comment_positive: Super Ausblick von 302, alle sehr herzlich und hilfsbereit

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The location was perfect and the room amazing considering the price with a nice balcony. The hotel manager was extremely nice and friendly, making you feel at home

review.rating: Clean, comfortable, friendly and helpful host
review.comment_positive: The accomodation is clean and spacious. Location is centralised and easy to move around. The host speaks good English and very helpful during our stay there. We totally enjoyed our stay there. I will come back here again when I visit Hue next time.
Owner was so friendly, welcome drink & fruit on arrival, made sure we got our room early. Really good location near the river & around lots of food & drink options. Room was clean & spacious.

Personnel incroyablement gentil et aux petits soins (surclassement pour mon anniversaire, verre d’arrivée, prêt de parapluie, carte touristique). Localisation idéale proche du centre et des bus, grande chambre avec produits de douche, serviette de bain, bouteilles d’eau. On recommande!
Laura was very nice - she helped us to organise a private tour in Hue and transport to Hoi An. Highly recommended
Host were very friendly and helpful. Organized private car to go down to Golden hands and Hoi An . Told us what to watch out for.

- Laura sehr freundlich 
- Weiches Bett
- Dusche ein wenig abgetrennt
- Guet Aussicht vom Zimmer
- Tolles Frühstück
- Willkommens Früchte & Drink
- Tipps für Hue
review.comment_negative:
- Tücher und Bettwäsche hatten flecken
- Kein Glass oder Becher im Badezimmer

review.comment_positive: Excellent accueil, hôtes très sympathiques. très bons conseils pour les visites de la ville, restaurants, journée visite des tombeaux. Café offert très tôt le matin du départ :-).
Très bon séjour dans cet homestay tenu par une famille très gentille qui donne des conseils pour visiter la ville et ses alentours. Bon petit déjeuner. Très bon emplacement près du centre ville.

review.rating: Goed hotel, centraal gelegen en met mega vriendelijke eigenaren
review.comment_positive: Centraal gelegen hotel met super vriendelijke eigenaren. Voelden ons direct welkom. Elke ochtend een lekker ontbijt en ze hebben ons geholpen met het boeken van easy riders om de Hai Van Pass te rijden. Dit is ook echt een aanrader! Van Hue naar Hoi An! Kortom een geweldige ervaring in het Four Seasons hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The room was clean. The family was the best, they took very good care of us, they helped with restaurant recommendations, a city map and the best things to do in the city! The breakfast was wonderful. It was great to cool off from the heat in the pool.
The friendliest and most helpful people you could find in Hue.
review.comment_negative: Wish we had booked a longer stay

review.comment_positive:
Sehr familiäre Atmosphäre!
Frühstück wird jederzeit individuell zubereitet.
Rollerverleih unkompliziert in der Unterkunft möglich. 

Man muss sich bewusst sein, dass es kein 5 Sterne Hotel ist und ich bewusst sage Preis-Leistungs-Sieger
un servicio excelente y un muy buen trato de parte de la familia

De notre arrivée à notre départ Laura et sa famille ont été aux petits soins. Elle nous a indiqué toutes activités à faire à Hué et autour en précisant les moyens de transports disponibles. 
La chambre était très bien et correspondait aux photos. 
Le petit déj est varié et très copieux.
Je recommande !

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.rating: geweldig verblijf en super fijne kamer.
review.comment_positive: Zeer vriendelijk ontvangst na aankomst in HUE met de nachtbus. Gastvrouw gaf ons 2 flesjes water, thee en wat fruit bij aankomst. Daarnaast upgrade voor de kamer en veel uitleg over wat te doen in de omgeving. Boutique zit op loopafstand van de rivier en veel leuke restaurantjes. Laat je met een fietstaxi (50.000 dong) naar de citadel rijden, maar doe dit wel vroeg om de drukte voor te zijn.

review.rating: Estancia feliz, alojamiento  agradable y anfitriona muy  facilitadora
review.comment_positive:
El desayuno esta muy bien  en relación con lo que pagas .
La ubicación muy buena. La encargada estupenda , muy cariñosa y facilitadora para hacerte tu estancia cómoda y fácil
review.comment_negative: La habitación que tuve era pequeña pero cómoda para una sola persona
